original: yod du chug na yang zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: yod du chug na yang zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: Even if they did exist, they would be related to each other, and thus would be of the same nature.

original: de 'brel pa'i phyir gcig gi rang bzhin du gyur pa de ltar gzhan yang yin no zhes bya ba'i 'brel par 'gyur ba nyon mongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin te /
analyzed: de 'brel pa'i phyir gcig gi rang bzhin du gyur pa de ltar gzhan yang yin no zhes bya ba'i 'brel par 'gyur ba nyon mongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin te /
translated: But this is a conceptual thought that is related to the afflictions.

original: 'brel kyang rang gi bdag nyid kho na la rnam par gnas pa'i phyir gzhan gyi ngo bo med pas de'i bdag nyid dang 'dre ba ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'brel kyang rang gi bdag nyid kho na la rnam par gnas pa'i phyir gzhan gyi ngo bo med pas de'i bdag nyid dang 'dre ba ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Even if they were related, they would not be mixed with each other, because they would each remain in their own nature, and the nature of the other would not exist.

original: 'byung po rnams kyang mgul chings kyi rang bzhin du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'byung po rnams kyang mgul chings kyi rang bzhin du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: And it would follow that the elements would have the nature of a necklace.

original: 'phrod pas 'du bas kyang tha dad pa sel ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'phrod pas 'du bas kyang tha dad pa sel ba ni ma yin no //
translated: And the combination of the elements would not eliminate their difference.

original: des na de ltar de dag ni rang dang gzhan du 'dre bar mi byed de zhes bya ba gal te bsgrub bya brjod pa yin na /
analyzed: des na de ltar de dag ni rang dang gzhan du 'dre bar mi byed de zhes bya ba gal te bsgrub bya brjod pa yin na /
translated: So if this is the thesis, then the statement, “Thus, they do not mix with each other” is the conclusion.

original: de'i tshe de lta bas na dngos po 'di dag ni zhes bya ba mjug bsdu ba yin la /
analyzed: de'i tshe de lta bas na dngos po 'di dag ni zhes bya ba mjug bsdu ba yin la /
translated: And the statement, “Therefore, these things” is the summary.

original: der yang rigs mi mthun par 'dod pa dang zhes bya ba ni bshad pa yin no //🔽yang na de dag ni rang dang gzhan du @158a * //
analyzed: der yang rigs mi mthun par 'dod pa dang zhes bya ba ni bshad pa yin no // yang na de dag ni rang dang gzhan du @158a * //
translated: The explanation is that they are asserted to be of a homogeneous type.

original: 'dre bar mi byed de shes bya ba ni rang gi ngo bo la gnas ba can kho na'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs kyi byed pa bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dre bar mi byed de shes bya ba ni rang gi ngo bo la gnas ba can kho na'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs kyi byed pa bstan pa yin te /
translated: Or, they do not mix with each other, because the object of knowledge is only that which exists in its own nature. This shows the function of the reason.

original: des na de lta bas na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gtan tshigs sgrub pa na bsgrub bya brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: des na de lta bas na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gtan tshigs sgrub pa na bsgrub bya brjod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, since it is like this, etc. is the conclusion, which is stated in the proof.

original: gang gi phyir rang gi bdag nyid la gnas pa'i phyir ma 'dres pa de bas na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rang gi bdag nyid la gnas pa'i phyir ma 'dres pa de bas na /
translated: Because it exists in its own nature, it is unmixed.

original: rigs mthun par 'dod pa dang / rigs mi mthun pa la sogs pa yin te ldog pa yin no //
analyzed: rigs mthun par 'dod pa dang / rigs mi mthun pa la sogs pa yin te ldog pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is asserted to be of a homogeneous type, and it is excluded from a heterogeneous type.

original: 'dod pas smos pa ni rigs mthun pa nyid gzhan gyi 'dod pas yin par bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod pas smos pa ni rigs mthun pa nyid gzhan gyi 'dod pas yin par bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The mention of “asserted” is to show that the assertion of a homogeneous type is another’s assertion.

original: dngos po ni du ma'i ngo bo yin gyi thams cad kyi ngo bo ma yin te /
analyzed: dngos po ni du ma'i ngo bo yin gyi thams cad kyi ngo bo ma yin te /
translated: A thing is a multiple nature, not the nature of everything.

original: des na de lta bu'i bdag nyid la gnas pa'i phyir bdag nyid gang la mi gnas pa de las ldog pa yin no zhes kyang dogs par bya ba ma yin no zhes gtan tshigs gzhan gyis ston pa ni /
analyzed: des na de lta bu'i bdag nyid la gnas pa'i phyir bdag nyid gang la mi gnas pa de las ldog pa yin no zhes kyang dogs par bya ba ma yin no zhes gtan tshigs gzhan gyis ston pa ni /
translated: Therefore, because it abides in such a nature, it is not to be doubted that it is the opposite of that which does not abide in any nature.

original: rang gi ngo bos ngo bo gcig pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bos ngo bo gcig pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The other reason is stated: because of being essentially one.

original: tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'i don bshad pa ni dngos po rnams gang dang gang las tha dad pa de dang de las tha dad pa rgyu mtshan du nye bar brten nas ngo bo nyid tha mi dad kyang chos du ma shes par byed do //
analyzed: tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'i don bshad pa ni dngos po rnams gang dang gang las tha dad pa de dang de las tha dad pa rgyu mtshan du nye bar brten nas ngo bo nyid tha mi dad kyang chos du ma shes par byed do //
translated: The meaning of the second verse is explained: from whatever things they are distinguished, from that they are distinguished. Relying on that reason, even though they are not essentially different, many phenomena are known.

original: gang gis shes par byed ce na bshad pa /
analyzed: gang gis shes par byed ce na bshad pa /
translated: By what are they known? It is explained:

original: sgra dag gis so //
analyzed: sgra dag gis so //
translated: by words.

original: de dag gi shes pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par rtog pas kyang rtogs par 'gyur bas chos de dag rnam par brtags par 'gyur pa yin te /
analyzed: de dag gi shes pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par rtog pas kyang rtogs par 'gyur bas chos de dag rnam par brtags par 'gyur pa yin te /
translated: Since their cognition is also understood by conceptual thought, those phenomena become conceptualized.

original: des na sgra rnams kyang ldog pa'i yul can du bstan pa'i phyir rigs dbye zhes bya ba brjod par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: des na sgra rnams kyang ldog pa'i yul can du bstan pa'i phyir rigs dbye zhes bya ba brjod par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, in order to show that the words are also the subject of the exclusion, the expression “differentiation” is used.

original: gal te ldog pa tha dad pa'i phyir de'i rgyu mtshan gyis tha dad par rtogs na /
analyzed: gal te ldog pa tha dad pa'i phyir de'i rgyu mtshan gyis tha dad par rtogs na /
translated: If one understands the difference in the reason for the difference in the exclusion,

original: 'o na rang bzhin tha mi dad pas de'i rgyu mtshan gyis tha mi dad par rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'o na rang bzhin tha mi dad pas de'i rgyu mtshan gyis tha mi dad par rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: then one understands the non-difference in the reason for the non-difference in the intrinsic nature.

original: des na de'i rgyu can gyi rigs dbye zhes ci ste brjod ce na zhes dogs pa la /
analyzed: des na de'i rgyu can gyi rigs dbye zhes ci ste brjod ce na zhes dogs pa la /
translated: Therefore, why is the differentiation said to be based on that?

original: mdo'i ldog pa'i rgyu can gyi rigs dbye ba brtags par bshad pa ni rnam par rtog pa rnams ldog pa'i yul can yin pa las nges par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir de'i zhes smos so //
analyzed: mdo'i ldog pa'i rgyu can gyi rigs dbye ba brtags par bshad pa ni rnam par rtog pa rnams ldog pa'i yul can yin pa las nges par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir de'i zhes smos so //
translated: In order to show that the differentiation based on the exclusion of the treatise should be understood as being the subject of the exclusion of conceptualization, he says “that”.

original: dbye ba shes par bya ba'i phyir sgra brdar btags pa yin no //
analyzed: dbye ba shes par bya ba'i phyir sgra brdar btags pa yin no //
translated: The words are designated as the reason for the differentiation in order to make it known.

original: des na de nyid ston pa na de'i rgyu mtshan gyis 'khrul pas dngos po rnams la chos tha dad par shes @158b par byed do //
analyzed: des na de nyid ston pa na de'i rgyu mtshan gyis 'khrul pas dngos po rnams la chos tha dad par shes @158b par byed do //
translated: Therefore, when that is taught, by that reason, one should understand that things are different phenomena due to delusion.

original: rnam par rtog pas yul du byas pa'i don nyid la sgra sbyor ro //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pas yul du byas pa'i don nyid la sgra sbyor ro //
translated: The meaning that is the object of conceptualization is applied to the word.

original: des na gal te 'di tha dad pa'i yul can yin na de'i phyir de bstan pa'i don du sgra dgos pa yin no //
analyzed: des na gal te 'di tha dad pa'i yul can yin na de'i phyir de bstan pa'i don du sgra dgos pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, if this has a different object, then for the sake of teaching that, the word is necessary.

original: des na de ltar sgras ba cad pas de lta bu'i rnam par rtog pa'i rang bzhin brjod par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: des na de ltar sgras ba cad pas de lta bu'i rnam par rtog pa'i rang bzhin brjod par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, in that way, by the word, the nature of such a conceptualization is expressed.

original: dngos po gnas pa'i bya ba yod na /
analyzed: dngos po gnas pa'i bya ba yod na /
translated: If the action of the abiding thing exists,

original: rigs pa dngos po'i yul du 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: rigs pa dngos po'i yul du 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: reason would be the object of the thing.

original: dngos po yang sngon po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du nges pa yin no //
analyzed: dngos po yang sngon po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du nges pa yin no //
translated: And the thing is ascertained as the nature of blue, etc.

original: des na de ni gsal ba'i rang bzhin gyi myong bas rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: des na de ni gsal ba'i rang bzhin gyi myong bas rtogs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, that is understood by the experience of the nature of manifestation.

original: de ltar gsal ba na don la na cung zad kyang ma yin gyi ;
analyzed: de ltar gsal ba na don la na cung zad kyang ma yin gyi ;
translated: In that way, when manifesting, it is not anything at all in the object.

original: 'on kyang dngos po ji lta ba de lta bu'i gsal ba skyes na rtogs pa po de rig pa dang ldan pa'i ngo bor mngon par grub pa'i phyir 'jal ba po don rig pa la nye bar mkho ba yin gyi /
analyzed: 'on kyang dngos po ji lta ba de lta bu'i gsal ba skyes na rtogs pa po de rig pa dang ldan pa'i ngo bor mngon par grub pa'i phyir 'jal ba po don rig pa la nye bar mkho ba yin gyi /
translated: But if a cognition arises in accordance with the way things are, then the cognizer is established as having the nature of awareness, and so the cognizer is required to know the object.

original: ngas don la ni cir yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ngas don la ni cir yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: But it does not become anything at all in regard to the object.

original: de bzhin du rig pa 'ga' zhig ni rtogs pa po don phyin ci log tu rtogs par byed do //
analyzed: de bzhin du rig pa 'ga' zhig ni rtogs pa po don phyin ci log tu rtogs par byed do //
translated: In the same way, some awareness causes the cognizer to understand the object in a distorted way.

original: des kyang rtogs pa po la don phyin ci log tu byas pa yin te /
analyzed: des kyang rtogs pa po la don phyin ci log tu byas pa yin te /
translated: It also causes the cognizer to misconstrue the object.

original: dung ser por shes pas dung ser por byas pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dung ser por shes pas dung ser por byas pa bzhin no //
translated: It is like the cognition of a yellow conch causing the conch to appear as yellow.

original: gal te 'di ni dung ser po tsam gyi yul can dung la ma reg par de ltar snang ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te 'di ni dung ser po tsam gyi yul can dung la ma reg par de ltar snang ba ma yin nam /
translated: But isn’t this cognition of a yellow conch merely a cognition of a yellow conch? It does not appear in that way without contacting the conch.

original: rtogs pa po la don phyin ci log tu byed do zhes ji ltar brjod ce na /
analyzed: rtogs pa po la don phyin ci log tu byed do zhes ji ltar brjod ce na /
translated: So how can it be said that it causes the cognizer to misconstrue the object?

original: brjod pa de'i rang bzhin gyi yul non pa dang de'i thon kor na gnas pa bral pa dang don dam pa ma yin pa'i de'i rang bzhin rtogs pa lta bur snang ba de der rjes su zhugs pa nyid kyis de'i rang bzhin ma yin yang de'i rang bzhin
analyzed: brjod pa de'i rang bzhin gyi yul non pa dang de'i thon kor na gnas pa bral pa dang don dam pa ma yin pa'i de'i rang bzhin rtogs pa lta bur snang ba de der rjes su zhugs pa nyid kyis de'i rang bzhin ma yin yang de'i rang bzhin
translated: The object of that expression, the nature of which is to be excluded from the place of its origin and to be realized as the nature of the ultimate, appears as if it were the nature of that.

original: du gyur pas ser po'i rnam par snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: du gyur pas ser po'i rnam par snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: That is the case because it is engaged in that, and because it is the nature of that, even though it is not the nature of that, it appears in the aspect of yellow.

original: snang bar gyur ba'i rang bzhin mtha' dag spangs nas snang bar bzod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: snang bar gyur ba'i rang bzhin mtha' dag spangs nas snang bar bzod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not the case that the entire nature of the appearance is abandoned and then the appearance is tolerated.

original: des na de lta bur gyur pa ma yin yang gang kho na snang ba zhugs nas gsal pa de kho na 'dis rtogs pa po la de ltar bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: des na de lta bur gyur pa ma yin yang gang kho na snang ba zhugs nas gsal pa de kho na 'dis rtogs pa po la de ltar bstan pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, even though it is not the case that it is just that, the one who is engaged in the appearance and is illuminated, he alone is taught to the cognizer in that way.

original: des na dngos po de lta bu ma yin ba dag kyang de dang tha mi dad par 'gyur bar byed pa'i rtogs pa 'di ni dngos po la gzhol ba nyid do //
analyzed: des na dngos po de lta bu ma yin ba dag kyang de dang tha mi dad par 'gyur bar byed pa'i rtogs pa 'di ni dngos po la gzhol ba nyid do //
translated: Therefore, even though things are not like that, this cognition, which makes them become undifferentiated from that, is directed toward things.

original: 'dir nye bar sbyor bar 'grub pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dir nye bar sbyor bar 'grub pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not the case that it is established as being applied to that.

original: de shes pa nyid kyi dgos pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de shes pa nyid kyi dgos pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the purpose of consciousness itself.

original: de'i phyir dngos po rang gi ngo bos de'i rang @159a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir dngos po rang gi ngo bos de'i rang @159a * //
translated: Therefore, even though a thing is not essentially its nature,🔽the cognition of silver, etc., makes it appear as if it were not different from another object.

original: bzhin ma yin pa yang dngul la sogs pa'i rtogs pas de ltar don gzhan dang tha mi dad par byed pa de'i rtogs pa bsal bas tha mi dad par zlog par byed pas na tha mi dad pa'i don can nyid kyis don 'jal ba po la nye bar🔽mkho ba yin no //
analyzed: bzhin ma yin pa yang dngul la sogs pa'i rtogs pas de ltar don gzhan dang tha mi dad par byed pa de'i rtogs pa bsal bas tha mi dad par zlog par byed pas na tha mi dad pa'i don can nyid kyis don 'jal ba po la nye bar mkho ba yin no //
translated: Since the cognition of that is removed by the removal of the appearance of non-difference, the non-difference is refuted.🔽Thus, the cognition of the object, which has the meaning of non-difference, is useful to the one who cognizes.

original: tha dad par byed pa nyid kyis cig shos dang 'dra bar rtogs par byed pa yin pas na 'di la yang don la phyogs pa'i byed pa'i yod pa nyid do //
analyzed: tha dad par byed pa nyid kyis cig shos dang 'dra bar rtogs par byed pa yin pas na 'di la yang don la phyogs pa'i byed pa'i yod pa nyid do //
translated: Since it makes the other appear as if it were different, it is also a means of knowledge that has the object as its object.

original: des na de lta rnam pa gnyis yod pa las /
analyzed: des na de lta rnam pa gnyis yod pa las /
translated: Thus, there are two types of this.

original: gal te rnam par rtogs pa nyams su myong ba bzhin don rtogs pa'i rang bzhin yin no //
analyzed: gal te rnam par rtogs pa nyams su myong ba bzhin don rtogs pa'i rang bzhin yin no //
translated: If the cognition is of the nature of cognizing the object as it is experienced,

original: gal te 'dir 'gal ba mi brjod na 'gyur ba kho na'o //
analyzed: gal te 'dir 'gal ba mi brjod na 'gyur ba kho na'o //
translated: if there is no contradiction here, it is just so.

original: dngos po'i rang bzhin rtogs pa med kyang tha dad par byed pa nyid kyis dngos po'i mthar thug par byed pa ni mi nyams so //
analyzed: dngos po'i rang bzhin rtogs pa med kyang tha dad par byed pa nyid kyis dngos po'i mthar thug par byed pa ni mi nyams so //
translated: Even though the nature of things is not realized, the ultimate of things is not lost by making distinctions.

original: de ltar yang bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar yang bstan par bya'o //
translated: This will be shown.

original: des na 'di'i rtogs pa dang sgrun bzod par don dam par don la bya ba ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: des na 'di'i rtogs pa dang sgrun bzod par don dam par don la bya ba ni 'di yin te /
translated: Therefore, the meaning of this is that it is not possible to compare the realization of the ultimate with the realization of the conventional.

original: des na rnam par rtog pa tha dad pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir de nyid la sgra brdar 'dogs pa yin no //
analyzed: des na rnam par rtog pa tha dad pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir de nyid la sgra brdar 'dogs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, because it has a different object of conception, the conventional is designated as a word.🔽And because it has the meaning of difference, it superimposes a different thing on each single thing that is the opposite of many.

original: de yang tha dad pa'i don can yin pa'i phyir du ma'i bzlog phyogs su gyur pa'i dngos po gcig la yang bzlog zla'i dngos po gzhan re re sgro 'dogs par byed pa re re'i gnyen por gyur pas re re zhing skye ba na de sel ba'i yan lag
analyzed: de yang tha dad pa'i don can yin pa'i phyir du ma'i bzlog phyogs su gyur pa'i dngos po gcig la yang bzlog zla'i dngos po gzhan re re sgro 'dogs par byed pa re re'i gnyen por gyur pas re re zhing skye ba na de sel ba'i yan lag
translated: Each time it arises as the antidote to each superimposition, it is a part that removes that superimposition.

original: tu gyur pa de'i gnyen po'i dngos po'i rnam pa 'dzin pa dang / rang las bzlog pas bskal pa'i rnam pa gzhan yal bar dor bas chos gzhan las tha dad par rang gi rten gyi chos rtogs par byed pa yin no //🔽'di ltar ma byas par sgro 'dogs pa bzlog pa'i phyir ma byas pa'i gnyen por gyur pa /🔽dngos po'i bdag nyid du gyur pa'i byas pa la brten nas skye ba na /

original: de dag kyang ji skad bshad pa'i tshul kho nas tha dad pa'i don can nyid du rnam pa gzhan gsal bas bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag kyang ji skad bshad pa'i tshul kho nas tha dad pa'i don can nyid du rnam pa gzhan gsal bas bstan par bya'o //
translated: And they are to be taught by the clear explanation of another mode, that they have a different meaning, just as it has been explained.

original: tha dad pa'i rtogs pa gzhan ni yod @159b pa ma yin no //
analyzed: tha dad pa'i rtogs pa gzhan ni yod @159b pa ma yin no //
translated: There is no other way to understand difference.

original: tha dad pa zhes bya ba gal te rang gi rang bzhin la gnas pa yin na /
analyzed: tha dad pa zhes bya ba gal te rang gi rang bzhin la gnas pa yin na /
translated: If difference is based on its own intrinsic reality,

original: thams cad tha dad par rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thams cad tha dad par rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: then everything would be understood as different.

original: 'on te dngos po med pa yin na bum pa med do snyam pa tha dad pa rtogs pa yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'on te dngos po med pa yin na bum pa med do snyam pa tha dad pa rtogs pa yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: But if it is non-existent, then the understanding of difference would be the thought “The pot does not exist.”

original: ci ste dngos po la dngos po gzhan med pa yin na /
analyzed: ci ste dngos po la dngos po gzhan med pa yin na /
translated: But if it is the non-existence of one thing in another,

original: de gal te dngos po la dngos po gzhan yod pa ma yin no zhes dngos po gzhan bkag pa tsam yin na ni de'i tshe dngos po gzhan la cung zad kyang ma yin pa'i phyir tha dad pa dngos po'i rang bzhin las lhag par gyur pa de gang
analyzed: de gal te dngos po la dngos po gzhan yod pa ma yin no zhes dngos po gzhan bkag pa tsam yin na ni de'i tshe dngos po gzhan la cung zad kyang ma yin pa'i phyir tha dad pa dngos po'i rang bzhin las lhag par gyur pa de gang
translated: if it is the mere negation of another thing in a thing, in the sense that “another thing does not exist in this thing,” then at that time, since it is nothing whatsoever in another thing, what is that difference that is beyond the intrinsic reality of a thing?

original: zhig yin na gang gis tha dad par rtogs pa rang gi ngo bo rtogs pa las bya ba gzhan dang ldan par 'gyur /
analyzed: zhig yin na gang gis tha dad par rtogs pa rang gi ngo bo rtogs pa las bya ba gzhan dang ldan par 'gyur /
translated: If it is a non-entity, then the cognition of it would be different from the cognition of its own nature, and it would possess an activity that is different.

original: 'on te dngos po la dngos po gzhan med pa nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te dngos po la dngos po gzhan med pa nyid do zhe na /
translated: But if you say that an entity does not have another entity,

original: dngos po gzhan bsal ba na dngos po la brtan pa'i sgrub pa'i spyod yul du 'gyur ba dngos po med pa zhes bya ba de gang yin /
analyzed: dngos po gzhan bsal ba na dngos po la brtan pa'i sgrub pa'i spyod yul du 'gyur ba dngos po med pa zhes bya ba de gang yin /
translated: then what is that so-called non-entity that becomes the object of affirmation based on an entity when another entity is excluded?

original: de'i phyir dngos po la dngos po gzhan med do zhes bya ba 'di tsam kho na ldog pa brjod pas na tha dad pa'i rtogs pa dag la rtogs pa'i byed pa mi 'dra ba med kyang ji skad bshad pa'i tshul nyid khas blang bar bya ba yin no
analyzed: de'i phyir dngos po la dngos po gzhan med do zhes bya ba 'di tsam kho na ldog pa brjod pas na tha dad pa'i rtogs pa dag la rtogs pa'i byed pa mi 'dra ba med kyang ji skad bshad pa'i tshul nyid khas blang bar bya ba yin no
translated: Therefore, this much alone is stated by the expression of negation: An entity does not have another entity. Thus, although there is no difference in the activity of cognition in the cognitions of difference, one should accept the very method that has been explained.

original: // da ni de'i khyad par ni rtogs par 'gyur ba dag rab tu byed ces bya ba de 'chad do //
analyzed: // da ni de'i khyad par ni rtogs par 'gyur ba dag rab tu byed ces bya ba de 'chad do //
translated: Now, he explains that very method: The difference of that is cognized by the cognitions that are produced.

original: sgra de dag kyang de'i rang bzhin mtshan nyid spyi'i phyin pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgra de dag kyang de'i rang bzhin mtshan nyid spyi'i phyin pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
translated: And those words would only express the general characteristic that is its nature.

original: sgra bems po yin pa'i phyir de dag 'gyur ba 'ga' yang med do //
analyzed: sgra bems po yin pa'i phyir de dag 'gyur ba 'ga' yang med do //
translated: because sound is an inanimate object, it does not change in any way.

original: des na des skyed pa'i rtogs pa de'i rang bzhin yin pas de skad brjod do //
analyzed: des na des skyed pa'i rtogs pa de'i rang bzhin yin pas de skad brjod do //
translated: Therefore, the conceptualization that is produced by it has that as its nature, and so it is said to be like that.

original: 'di la rang bzhin ji lta bur brtag pa de lta bu de la yod pa'i phyir de'i yul can ma yin yang de'i mthar thug pa 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di la rang bzhin ji lta bur brtag pa de lta bu de la yod pa'i phyir de'i yul can ma yin yang de'i mthar thug pa 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Even though it does not have that as its object, it is the culmination of that, because it has that nature in whatever way it is imagined.

original: gal te rang gi mtshan nyid ni mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yin la /
analyzed: gal te rang gi mtshan nyid ni mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yin la /
translated: If impermanence, etc., are the natures of their own characteristics,

original: rnam par rtog par ni chos gcig tsam gyi yul can yin pas /
analyzed: rnam par rtog par ni chos gcig tsam gyi yul can yin pas /
translated: and conceptualization has the object of only one thing,

original: ji ltar de'i yul can yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar de'i yul can yin zhe na /
translated: how can it have that as its object?

original: bshad pa / gal te yang 'dir mi rtag pa la sogs pa tha dad pa thams can mi 'phen pa de lta na yang byas pa nyid la sogs pa de'i tha dad pa gcig sgras brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: bshad pa / gal te yang 'dir mi rtag pa la sogs pa tha dad pa thams can mi 'phen pa de lta na yang byas pa nyid la sogs pa de'i tha dad pa gcig sgras brjod pa yin no //
translated: If, although all the differences of impermanence, etc., are not projected here, still the difference of that, such as being produced, is expressed by the word,

original: de gcig las kyang de tha dad pa byas pa nyid la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid de yod pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de gcig las kyang de tha dad pa byas pa nyid la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid de yod pa kho na'o //
translated: then that difference exists in only one thing, such as being produced, because that characteristic of being produced, etc., exists in only one thing.

original: de tha dad pa zhes tha dad par bsnyad pa ni rang bzhin gzhan dang mi mthun pa @160a * //
analyzed: de tha dad pa zhes tha dad par bsnyad pa ni rang bzhin gzhan dang mi mthun pa @160a * //
translated: The expression different is a designation of difference, and it expresses a nature that is not the same as itself.

original: rang gi bdag nyid la gnas pa'i rang bzhin brjod pa yin gyi tha dad pa zhes bya ba gzhan ni 'ga' yang med do //
analyzed: rang gi bdag nyid la gnas pa'i rang bzhin brjod pa yin gyi tha dad pa zhes bya ba gzhan ni 'ga' yang med do //
translated: There is no other so-called difference.

original: ji skad bshad pa bzhin no //
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa bzhin no //
translated: As it has been explained.

original: de lta bas na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bshad pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa gnyis la gnas pa'i dngos po nye bar 'god pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bas na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bshad pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa gnyis la gnas pa'i dngos po nye bar 'god pa'o //
translated: The expression that is why, etc., presents the thing that is based on the two verses that have been explained.

original: dngos po gcig la gzhan gyi ngo bo de'i ngo bos stong pa'i ngo bo ji snyed pa de gzhan de la ltos nas ldog pa'i de snyed yod do //
analyzed: dngos po gcig la gzhan gyi ngo bo de'i ngo bos stong pa'i ngo bo ji snyed pa de gzhan de la ltos nas ldog pa'i de snyed yod do //
translated: In as many natures as the nature of one thing is empty of the nature of another, in that many ways it is excluded in dependence on the other.

original: ngo bo de snyed la de med pa'i phyir de la yang ngo bo de snyed med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ngo bo de snyed la de med pa'i phyir de la yang ngo bo de snyed med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that in as many natures as it is not, in that many natures it is not either.

original: gtan tshigs bshad pa ni dngos po gcig po de la med pa'i rgyu ngang 'bras bu gang la yod pa gzhan gyi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs bshad pa ni dngos po gcig po de la med pa'i rgyu ngang 'bras bu gang la yod pa gzhan gyi ngo bo'o //
translated: The explanation of the reason is that the effect, which is the non-existence of that one thing, exists in the many natures of the other, which is the cause of the non-existence.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu smos pas ni sngon po la sogs pa rang bzhin yang mtshon pa yin no //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu smos pas ni sngon po la sogs pa rang bzhin yang mtshon pa yin no //
translated: By mentioning cause and effect, intrinsic nature is also indicated.

original: de lta bu dag las dngos po de tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta bu dag las dngos po de tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that entity is different from those,

original: gcig la med pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu can de nyid kyis ni gzhan de'i rang bzhin gyis stong par brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: gcig la med pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu can de nyid kyis ni gzhan de'i rang bzhin gyis stong par brjod pa yin no //
translated: it is said that it is empty of that intrinsic nature.

original: tha dad pas na 'di gzhan la med pa'i phyir gzhan yang 'di la med pa yin la de yang ldog pa yin no //
analyzed: tha dad pas na 'di gzhan la med pa'i phyir gzhan yang 'di la med pa yin la de yang ldog pa yin no //
translated: Since it is different, it does not exist in another, and that other does not exist in it.

original: ldog pa'i snyed pa zhes bya ba ni de la ngo bo ji snyed med pa sgra dag kyang de snyed du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ldog pa'i snyed pa zhes bya ba ni de la ngo bo ji snyed med pa sgra dag kyang de snyed du 'gyur ro //
translated: The extent of the exclusion is the extent to which it lacks intrinsic nature, and the words are to that extent.

original: 'di dag rang bzhin ngo bo nyid kyis yul tha dad pas tha dad pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di dag rang bzhin ngo bo nyid kyis yul tha dad pas tha dad pa ni ma yin no //
translated: These are not different because their intrinsic natures are different.

original: zhes bshad pa ni tha snyad kyi don can gyi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bshad pa ni tha snyad kyi don can gyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is the meaning of the conventional.

original: dgos pa yod na yin gyi med na ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dgos pa yod na yin gyi med na ni ma yin no //
translated: It is when there is a purpose, not when there is not.

original: rang nyid 'gyur ba yin na ni dgos pa la ltos par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: rang nyid 'gyur ba yin na ni dgos pa la ltos par mi 'gyur te /
translated: If it were to change by itself, it would not depend on a purpose.

original: mngon sum bzhin no //
analyzed: mngon sum bzhin no //
translated: like a direct perception.

original: tha dad pa'i mthar thug pa rnams ji ltar tha snyad la nye bar sbyor ba de bshad pa ni /
analyzed: tha dad pa'i mthar thug pa rnams ji ltar tha snyad la nye bar sbyor ba de bshad pa ni /
translated: How are those that are different in the end applied to conventional usage?

original: de'i rgyu dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i rgyu dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: That is explained: “its cause” and so on.

original: brtsal ma thag tu byung ba can zhes bya ba ni de'i rgyu can ma yin pa de spong ba'o //
analyzed: brtsal ma thag tu byung ba can zhes bya ba ni de'i rgyu can ma yin pa de spong ba'o //
translated: “Arisen immediately after exertion” means that which is not caused by that is excluded.

original: nyan pa can zhes bya ba ni de'i 'bras bu can ma yin pa ni yongs su spong ba'o //
analyzed: nyan pa can zhes bya ba ni de'i 'bras bu can ma yin pa ni yongs su spong ba'o //
translated: “That which is not the result of that” is completely excluded.

original: tshig le'ur byas pa gsum pa'i don bshad pa ni /
analyzed: tshig le'ur byas pa gsum pa'i don bshad pa ni /
translated: The meaning of the third verse is explained:

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Therefore” and so on.

original: ming zhes bya ba ni sgra'o //
analyzed: ming zhes bya ba ni sgra'o //
translated: “Name” means sound.

original: chos zhes bya ba ni brtags pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: chos zhes bya ba ni brtags pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: “Phenomena” means the nature of the imagined.

original: grong rta mi phyugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa bzhin du dang zhes bsdu ba yin no //
analyzed: grong rta mi phyugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa bzhin du dang zhes bsdu ba yin no //
translated: Like “town,” “horse,” “cow,” and so on, “and so on” includes those.

original: yang na chos zhes bya ba 'di bshad pa ming zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: yang na chos zhes bya ba 'di bshad pa ming zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: Or, this explanation of “phenomena” is “name.”

original: chos kyi sgra ni dngos po tsam brngod pa yin te /
analyzed: chos kyi sgra ni dngos po tsam brngod pa yin te /
translated: The word “phenomena” is the mere designation of an entity.

original: chos thams can bdag med pa zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: chos thams can bdag med pa zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: Like “all phenomena are selfless.”

original: rtogs pa'i @160b sgrub byed du nye bar blang na sgra la 'jug go //
analyzed: rtogs pa'i @160b sgrub byed du nye bar blang na sgra la 'jug go //
translated: If it is taken as a proof of the understanding, then it is used as a word.

original: sgra dang rnam par rtog pa rnams tha dad pa'i don can nyid kyis de'i yan lag yin pas de dang mthun par brtags pa'i rang bzhin gyis na yul 'chol ba med pa'i phyir dam bcas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig gtan tshigs ma yin no zhes bshad pa ni
analyzed: sgra dang rnam par rtog pa rnams tha dad pa'i don can nyid kyis de'i yan lag yin pas de dang mthun par brtags pa'i rang bzhin gyis na yul 'chol ba med pa'i phyir dam bcas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig gtan tshigs ma yin no zhes bshad pa ni
translated: Since words and conceptual thoughts have different meanings, they are not parts of the proof. Therefore, the reason is not a part of the proposition, because it is imagined to be consistent with that, and because it does not have a random object.

original: de bas na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bas na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is explained in the line “Therefore…”

original: de de ltar tha dad pa'i don can nyid grub pa bzhin du nye bar ston to //
analyzed: de de ltar tha dad pa'i don can nyid grub pa bzhin du nye bar ston to //
translated: Thus, it is shown that the meaning of the word is established as having a different meaning.

original: da ni gzhung gzugs pa'i phyir yang sgra dang zhes rgol pa 'god do //
analyzed: da ni gzhung gzugs pa'i phyir yang sgra dang zhes rgol pa 'god do //
translated: Now, in order to present the treatise, the opponent’s position is stated:

original: rang gi ngo bo la gnas pa'i phyir rang gi ngang gis dngos po gzhan las tha dad pa yin yang 'khrul pa'i mthus dngos po gzhan gyi ngo bo dang tha dad pa med par gyur pa gang yin pa de sel ba na de'i rang gi ngo bo rtogs
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo la gnas pa'i phyir rang gi ngang gis dngos po gzhan las tha dad pa yin yang 'khrul pa'i mthus dngos po gzhan gyi ngo bo dang tha dad pa med par gyur pa gang yin pa de sel ba na de'i rang gi ngo bo rtogs
translated: Although things that exist by their own nature are naturally different from other things, due to the power of delusion, they become as if they were not different from the nature of other things. When that is eliminated, its own nature is understood.

original: pa gang yin pa'i rnam par gcad pa de sgra dang rtags dag gis rtogs par byed do zhes bya ba ci ltar shes /🔽sgrub pas dngos po'i rang gi ngo bo kho na ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni bsal zin pa'i sgo nyid spang ste /
analyzed: pa gang yin pa'i rnam par gcad pa de sgra dang rtags dag gis rtogs par byed do zhes bya ba ci ltar shes / sgrub pas dngos po'i rang gi ngo bo kho na ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni bsal zin pa'i sgo nyid spang ste /
translated: How do you know that the exclusion of what is not that is understood by means of words and signs?🔽The statement “It is not the nature of the thing itself that is established” is refuted by the very same method that was used to refute the opponent’s position.

original: rang bzhin rtogs pa tsam gyi sgrub pas dngos po rtog pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin rtogs pa tsam gyi sgrub pas dngos po rtog pa nyid do //
translated: The mere understanding of the nature of a thing is not the understanding of the thing itself.

original: 'di sngon po yin no zhes bya ba ni dngos po'i rang bzhin tsam rtogs pa yin la /
analyzed: 'di sngon po yin no zhes bya ba ni dngos po'i rang bzhin tsam rtogs pa yin la /
translated: The statement “This is blue” is the understanding of the nature of the thing itself.

original: 'di sngon po ma yin no zhes bya ba ni sngon po bsal ba'i sgo nas de rtogs pa yin pas byed pa gnyis 'grub tha dad par rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di sngon po ma yin no zhes bya ba ni sngon po bsal ba'i sgo nas de rtogs pa yin pas byed pa gnyis 'grub tha dad par rtogs pa yin no //
translated: The statement “This is not blue” is the understanding of that thing by way of the exclusion of blue. Thus, the understanding of the two actions is established as distinct.

original: khyed kyis ni thams can du rnam par gcad pa yul can nying du smras pas na 'di sngon pa'o snyam pa yang de'i yul can nyid du brjod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khyed kyis ni thams can du rnam par gcad pa yul can nying du smras pas na 'di sngon pa'o snyam pa yang de'i yul can nyid du brjod par 'gyur ro //
translated: Since you maintain that the object of exclusion is the subject, you would have to say that the thought “This is blue” is the subject.

original: des na 'di lta bu'i bdag nyid kyi rnam par shes pa rnams rang bzhin rtogs pa tsam ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang tha dad pa'i yul can yin no zhes bya ba 'di la rigs pa ci yod ce na /
analyzed: des na 'di lta bu'i bdag nyid kyi rnam par shes pa rnams rang bzhin rtogs pa tsam ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang tha dad pa'i yul can yin no zhes bya ba 'di la rigs pa ci yod ce na /
translated: Therefore, what is the logic in saying that consciousnesses with such a nature are not merely realizations of their own nature but are subjects that are different from their objects?

original: dgos pa 'di bzlog pa ni /
analyzed: dgos pa 'di bzlog pa ni /
translated: The purpose of this is to refute the following.

original: tshad ma gzhan dang zhes bya ba ni la sogs pa'o /
analyzed: tshad ma gzhan dang zhes bya ba ni la sogs pa'o /
translated: “Other valid knowledge” means valid knowledge such as inference and so on.

original: tshad ma ni rtags yin la /
analyzed: tshad ma ni rtags yin la /
translated: Valid knowledge is a reason.

original: sgra ni rang nyid brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: sgra ni rang nyid brjod pa yin no //
translated: Sound is itself the expression.🔽Therefore, sound and reasons are what cause the realization of exclusion.

original: des na sgra dang rtags dag gis rnam par gcod par rtogs par byed do zhes nge ltar shes zhes smras pa gang yin pa de rtags la brten nas spangs pa yin no //🔽des na gang gi phyir rtags tshad ma gzhan dang sgra gzhan du gyur bas 'jug pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: des na sgra dang rtags dag gis rnam par gcod par rtogs par byed do zhes nge ltar shes zhes smras pa gang yin pa de rtags la brten nas spangs pa yin no // des na gang gi phyir rtags tshad ma gzhan dang sgra gzhan du gyur bas 'jug pa de'i tshe /
translated: This is what you say, but that is refuted by relying on a reason.🔽Therefore, when valid knowledge and sound are different,

original: sgra dang rtags dag rnam par gcod pa'i yul can nyid do //
analyzed: sgra dang rtags dag rnam par gcod pa'i yul can nyid do //
translated: at that time sound and reasons are subjects that are the objects of exclusion.

original: rtags ni thams cad du chos can @161a * //
analyzed: rtags ni thams cad du chos can @161a * //
translated: A reason is a property of the subject in all cases.

original: grub pa la ltos pa'i phyir mngon sum gyis yul du byas pa'i don la 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: grub pa la ltos pa'i phyir mngon sum gyis yul du byas pa'i don la 'jug pa yin no //
translated: because it depends on the established fact, it is the engagement in the object that is made the object of direct perception.

original: des na 'di ni tshad ma gzhan du gyur pas 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: des na 'di ni tshad ma gzhan du gyur pas 'jug pa yin no //
translated: Thus, it is the engagement of another valid cognition.

original: de bzhin du mngon sum gyis yul du byas pa'i chos can la brten te sgra 'jug pa na /
analyzed: de bzhin du mngon sum gyis yul du byas pa'i chos can la brten te sgra 'jug pa na /
translated: Similarly, when sound engages in the subject that is made the object of direct perception,

original: rjes su dpag pa 'jug pa'i sgra gang yin pa de sgra gzhan yin te /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa 'jug pa'i sgra gang yin pa de sgra gzhan yin te /
translated: the sound that engages in inference is another sound.

original: des na sgra gzhan 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: des na sgra gzhan 'jug pa yin no //
translated: Thus, it is the engagement of another sound.

original: des na don gyi rang gi ngo bo gcig ces bya ba'i gzhung 'di dang mthun pa 'di gtan tshigs su bkod pa yin no //
analyzed: des na don gyi rang gi ngo bo gcig ces bya ba'i gzhung 'di dang mthun pa 'di gtan tshigs su bkod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, this statement “one entity of the object” is consistent with the text, and it is stated as the reason.

original: rjes su dpag pa las kyang dngos po zhes bya ba dang / gzhan du dngos po gcig nyid la /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa las kyang dngos po zhes bya ba dang / gzhan du dngos po gcig nyid la /
translated: Also, in inference, the statement “entity” and “in one entity”

original: sgra 'am blo gcig gis khyab na zhes bya ba la ltos te /
analyzed: sgra 'am blo gcig gis khyab na zhes bya ba la ltos te /
translated: depend on the statement “if one sound or one cognition pervades.”

original: brgal zhing brtags pa'i sgra dang rtags dag ni /
analyzed: brgal zhing brtags pa'i sgra dang rtags dag ni /
translated: The sound and the reason that are the object of debate🔽are not established.

original: sgra dang tshad ma gzhan 'jug pa nyid kyis gzhan sel ba'i yul can du bsgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: sgra dang tshad ma gzhan 'jug pa nyid kyis gzhan sel ba'i yul can du bsgrub pa yin no //
translated: and by the application of other words and other validating cognitions, the object of the exclusion of other is established.

original: sgra dang rtags de dag gis ni gzhan sel ba rtogs pa yin te /
analyzed: sgra dang rtags de dag gis ni gzhan sel ba rtogs pa yin te /
translated: The words and the validating cognitions realize the exclusion of other,

original: rang gi phyir de yod pa la sgra dang tshad ma gzhan 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi phyir de yod pa la sgra dang tshad ma gzhan 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the words and the other validating cognitions apply to the existence of that object.

original: dang po dag gzhan sel ba'i yul can du 'gyur mod sgra dang tshad ma gzhan dag go //
analyzed: dang po dag gzhan sel ba'i yul can du 'gyur mod sgra dang tshad ma gzhan dag go //
translated: The first words and validating cognitions are indeed the subjects of the exclusion of other, but the other words and validating cognitions are not.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: de nyid kyi phyir snga ma'i bshad pa dgod pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir snga ma'i bshad pa dgod pa yin no //
translated: That is why the former explanation is given.

original: 'o na snga mar dang po dag ji ltar gzhan sel ba'i yul can yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na snga mar dang po dag ji ltar gzhan sel ba'i yul can yin zhe na /
translated: But how can the first words be the subjects of the exclusion of other?

original: de nyid kyi phyir phyi ma'i bshad pa nye bar dgod do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir phyi ma'i bshad pa nye bar dgod do //
translated: That is why the latter explanation is given.

original: 'di ltar snga ma yang dngos po mtha' dag khyab pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar snga ma yang dngos po mtha' dag khyab pa ma yin te /
translated: Thus the former words do not pervade all things,

original: gang gi phyir de zhugs pa la yang phyis 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de zhugs pa la yang phyis 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they apply to what has already been applied to.

original: de bzhin du phyi ma dag kyang sngar zhugs pa la dngos po'i phyogs gcig la dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du phyi ma dag kyang sngar zhugs pa la dngos po'i phyogs gcig la dmigs pa yin no //
translated: In the same way, the subsequent cognitions, which are based on the previous cognitions, have as their objects the individual things.

original: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i tshul gyis 'di na gzhan sel ba'i yul can ma yin par mi 'thad do //
analyzed: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i tshul gyis 'di na gzhan sel ba'i yul can ma yin par mi 'thad do //
translated: And it is not tenable that they are not subjects that exclude other, as will be explained.

original: des na rim pa gnyi ga ltar yang sgra dang rtags 'jug pa'i phyir gzhan sel ba'i yul can gyi rang bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: des na rim pa gnyi ga ltar yang sgra dang rtags 'jug pa'i phyir gzhan sel ba'i yul can gyi rang bzhin nyid do //
translated: Therefore, since the terms and signs are applied in both cases, the nature of the cognition is that it excludes other.

original: de ltar ni 'di ni gzhan sel ba'i yul can nyid la rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs yin la /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'di ni gzhan sel ba'i yul can nyid la rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs yin la /
translated: In this way, the reason that the cognition is a subject that excludes other is its nature.

original: sgrub pas dngos po'i rang gi ngo bo rtogs pa 'gog pa la ni 'gal bas khyab pa dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: sgrub pas dngos po'i rang gi ngo bo rtogs pa 'gog pa la ni 'gal bas khyab pa dmigs pa'o //
translated: And the observation of a pervasion by contradiction is the refutation of the apprehension of the nature of a thing by a positive object.

original: gang zhig tshad ma gzhan du gyur pas 'jug pa'am gang la tshad ma gzhan 'jug pa'i don gcig la 'jug pa de ni gzhan sel pa'i yul can @161b yin la /
analyzed: gang zhig tshad ma gzhan du gyur pas 'jug pa'am gang la tshad ma gzhan 'jug pa'i don gcig la 'jug pa de ni gzhan sel pa'i yul can @161b yin la /
translated: That which is engaged by another valid cognition or that which is engaged by a single object of another valid cognition is a subject that excludes other.

original: sgrub pas dngos po 'dzin pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: sgrub pas dngos po 'dzin pa ni ma yin te /
translated: But it does not apprehend a thing by a positive object.

original: 'di ni sngon po ma yin no zhe 'am skad cig ma ma yin pa ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i shes pa bzhin no //
analyzed: 'di ni sngon po ma yin no zhe 'am skad cig ma ma yin pa ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i shes pa bzhin no //
translated: It is like the cognition that arises in the form, “This is not blue,” or “This is not momentary.”

original: sgra mi rtag go snyam du shes pa yang tshad ma gzhan du gyur pas 'jug pa'am /
analyzed: sgra mi rtag go snyam du shes pa yang tshad ma gzhan du gyur pas 'jug pa'am /
translated: The cognition that sound is impermanent is also engaged by the force of another valid cognition,

original: tshad ma gzhan gyi yul la 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: tshad ma gzhan gyi yul la 'jug pa yin no //
translated: or it is engaged in the domain of another valid cognition.

original: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag ni 'brel pa las yin la /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag ni 'brel pa las yin la /
translated: The positive and negative concomitances are established by the relation,

original: de yang tshad ma gzhan 'jug pa'i rang bzhin rnam par dpyad pas rnyed do //🔽zhes brjod pa ni /
analyzed: de yang tshad ma gzhan 'jug pa'i rang bzhin rnam par dpyad pas rnyed do // zhes brjod pa ni /
translated: and that is found by the analysis of the nature of the engagement of another valid cognition.🔽This is what is being said.

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: It is like this.

original: don gyi rang bzhin ngo bo tshad ma rnams kyis brtag par bya ba gang yin pa'i cha gzhan ci zhig yod /
analyzed: don gyi rang bzhin ngo bo tshad ma rnams kyis brtag par bya ba gang yin pa'i cha gzhan ci zhig yod /
translated: What other aspect of the nature of the object is there to be investigated by the valid cognitions?

original: brtag pa don du gnyer bas tshad ma 'jug pa ni rang dbang ma yin te /
analyzed: brtag pa don du gnyer bas tshad ma 'jug pa ni rang dbang ma yin te /
translated: The engagement of the valid cognitions by one who seeks to investigate the object is not independent,

original: de la rag las pa nas 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la rag las pa nas 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is engaged in dependence on that.

original: de yang rjes su dpag pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang rjes su dpag pa yin no //
translated: And that is inference.

original: de ni so so rang nyid kyi dmigs pa ma rnyed par grub pa ma yin na /
analyzed: de ni so so rang nyid kyi dmigs pa ma rnyed par grub pa ma yin na /
translated: It is not established without finding its own object.

original: de lta bur gyur pa'i don gyi cha de yang gang zhig yin /
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa'i don gyi cha de yang gang zhig yin /
translated: And what is that part of the object that is like that?

original: don de nyid brtag par bya ba ma yin nam de'i cha gzhan gyis ci zhig bya zhe na /
analyzed: don de nyid brtag par bya ba ma yin nam de'i cha gzhan gyis ci zhig bya zhe na /
translated: Isn’t that object itself to be examined? What is the use of another part of it?

original: ma yin no zhes bshad pa ni mngon sum yin pa la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ma yin no zhes bshad pa ni mngon sum yin pa la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The answer is “no” in “it is perception.”

original: mngon sum ma yin pa'i don ni brtag par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum ma yin pa'i don ni brtag par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: An object that is not perception cannot be examined.

original: des na de mngon sum du gyur pa ni brtags pa'i rten du gyur pa gzhan brjod par bya dgos so //
analyzed: des na de mngon sum du gyur pa ni brtags pa'i rten du gyur pa gzhan brjod par bya dgos so //
translated: Therefore, when it becomes perception, it must be stated that another part of it is the basis of examination.

original: mngon sum la mngon sum yin pa'i cha yod pa brtag par bya ba yin no zhe na /🔽ma yin no zhes bshad pa ni gcig ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: mngon sum la mngon sum yin pa'i cha yod pa brtag par bya ba yin no zhe na / ma yin no zhes bshad pa ni gcig ces bya ba'o //
translated: If perception has a part that is perception, it is to be examined.🔽The answer is “no” in “it is one.”

original: gcig la yang cha gzhan mi srid do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gcig la yang cha gzhan mi srid do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that even one does not have another part.

original: gal te don bdag nyid gsal ba ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang de dang 'dra ba'i rnam pa can gyi shes pa gsal ba yin no //
analyzed: gal te don bdag nyid gsal ba ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang de dang 'dra ba'i rnam pa can gyi shes pa gsal ba yin no //
translated: If the object itself is not clear, but rather the cognition that has the aspect of that object is clear,

original: de yang phyogs gcig gis 'dra ba na de'i phyogs gcig mngon sum du 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: de yang phyogs gcig gis 'dra ba na de'i phyogs gcig mngon sum du 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: and that is clear in part, then part of the object would be directly perceived.

original: ma yin no zhes bshad pa ni bdag nyid ces bya ba yin no //
analyzed: ma yin no zhes bshad pa ni bdag nyid ces bya ba yin no //
translated: The response to this is “No, it is not so.”

original: gzhan gnas lugs kyi snang ba na don rang nyid gsal bar 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: gzhan gnas lugs kyi snang ba na don rang nyid gsal bar 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: When the object appears in another way, the object itself becomes clear.

original: rang gi gnas lugs kyis don byed pa po yin pas na byed pa po nyid yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: rang gi gnas lugs kyis don byed pa po yin pas na byed pa po nyid yin pa bzhin no //
translated: Since the object is the agent of its own appearance, it is like an agent.

original: des na phyogs gcig gis gsal ba ma yin te /
analyzed: des na phyogs gcig gis gsal ba ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, it is not clear in part,

original: byed pa po bzhin no //🔽'o na mthong ba'i yul nyid brtags pa yin pas so so rang gi yul gzhan @162a * //
analyzed: byed pa po bzhin no // 'o na mthong ba'i yul nyid brtags pa yin pas so so rang gi yul gzhan @162a * //
translated: like an agent.🔽If the object is investigated as the object of seeing, then the individual object is not found.

original: rnyed pas ni don med do zhe na ma mthong zhes smos so //
analyzed: rnyed pas ni don med do zhe na ma mthong zhes smos so //
translated: Therefore, the object is meaningless. The response to this is “No, it is not seen.”

original: mthong bas yul du byas pa ni rtogs zin pa nyid kyis brtag pa don med pa'i phyir ma mthong ba'i yul nyid brtags par rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: mthong bas yul du byas pa ni rtogs zin pa nyid kyis brtag pa don med pa'i phyir ma mthong ba'i yul nyid brtags par rigs pa yin no //
translated: The object of seeing is not investigated, because it is useless to investigate what has already been seen. It is reasonable to investigate the object that is not seen.

original: 'di ni tshad ma gzhan sgrub pas dngos po'i ngo bo rtogs par byed pa nyid bsal te //
analyzed: 'di ni tshad ma gzhan sgrub pas dngos po'i ngo bo rtogs par byed pa nyid bsal te //
translated: This is the refutation of the fact that the nature of an entity is understood by the establishment of another valid cognition.

original: de 'jug pa ni nges par mngon sum gyis chos can grub pa la ltos pa yin no //
analyzed: de 'jug pa ni nges par mngon sum gyis chos can grub pa la ltos pa yin no //
translated: Because the operation of that [valid cognition] definitely depends on the establishment of the subject by perception.

original: des na chos can gyi chos mngon sum ma yin pa mi srid pas thams cad rtogs pa kho na yin pa'i phyir tshad ma gzhan bsgrubs pas ci zhig rtogs par byed /
analyzed: des na chos can gyi chos mngon sum ma yin pa mi srid pas thams cad rtogs pa kho na yin pa'i phyir tshad ma gzhan bsgrubs pas ci zhig rtogs par byed /
translated: Therefore, since it is impossible for the property of the subject not to be perceived, everything is understood. So what is understood by establishing another valid cognition?

original: don gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'grel par byed pa'o //
analyzed: don gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'grel par byed pa'o //
translated: The meaning of that and so on is explained in the commentary.

original: de ni mngon sum ma yin no //
analyzed: de ni mngon sum ma yin no //
translated: That is not perception.

original: gang la tshad ma gzhan 'jug pa'i don de ni gcig pa dang mngon sum gyis grub pa yin no //
analyzed: gang la tshad ma gzhan 'jug pa'i don de ni gcig pa dang mngon sum gyis grub pa yin no //
translated: The object to which another valid cognition applies is established as being one and perceived.

original: grub pa la nges pa bshad pa ni chos can ma grub na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: grub pa la nges pa bshad pa ni chos can ma grub na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The explanation of certainty in what is established is if the subject is not established.

original: dper na mi rtag pa bsgrub par bya ba la sgra gcig pa dang mngon sum gyis grub pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na mi rtag pa bsgrub par bya ba la sgra gcig pa dang mngon sum gyis grub pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, in the proof of impermanence, the word and the perception are established.

original: des cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: des cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What is the point of that?

original: de bshad pa /
analyzed: de bshad pa /
translated: That is explained:

original: des na gcig po de ni mngon sum kho nas grub pas rnam pa thams cad grub pa 'dir 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na gcig po de ni mngon sum kho nas grub pas rnam pa thams cad grub pa 'dir 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, since that one is established only by perception, all aspects are established here.

original: de nyid gzhung 'dzugs pa ni de la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid gzhung 'dzugs pa ni de la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: That very establishment is the basis of the treatise, which is stated by in that.

original: grub pa de las gzhan ni ma grub pa ste skabs kyis gcig po de'i rnam pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: grub pa de las gzhan ni ma grub pa ste skabs kyis gcig po de'i rnam pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That which is other than that establishment is non-establishment, because it does not have the aspect of that one in this context.

original: 'on te ma grub pa'i rnam pa yod na ni gcig po de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: 'on te ma grub pa'i rnam pa yod na ni gcig po de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin no //
translated: But if there were an aspect of non-establishment, it would not be the nature of that one.

original: ma grub pa'i rnam pa gang yin pa de ni gcig gi rang bzhin du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma grub pa'i rnam pa gang yin pa de ni gcig gi rang bzhin du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: That which is an aspect of non-establishment would not be the nature of one.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gang zhig ces smos so //
analyzed: gang zhig ces smos so //
translated: That which is stated.

original: de grub na grub pa nyid kyis gang zhig gang dang grub pa dang bde ba gcig pa can ma yin pa de ni de dang rnam pa gcig pa ma yin pas de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: de grub na grub pa nyid kyis gang zhig gang dang grub pa dang bde ba gcig pa can ma yin pa de ni de dang rnam pa gcig pa ma yin pas de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin no //
translated: If that is established, then by that very fact, that which is not of the same existence and happiness as that is not of the same aspect as that, and therefore is not of its nature.

original: tshes 'gal ba gnas pa nyid kyis tha dad par grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshes 'gal ba gnas pa nyid kyis tha dad par grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the contradiction of their abiding, their difference is established.

original: de bshad pa ni tha dad pa'i tha snyad ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bshad pa ni tha dad pa'i tha snyad ces bya ba'o //
translated: The explanation of that is called “the convention of difference.”

original: de mngon sum gyis grub na rnam pa thams cad grub mod /
analyzed: de mngon sum gyis grub na rnam pa thams cad grub mod /
translated: If that is established by perception, then all aspects are established.

original: de las kyang cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de las kyang cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What is the point of that?

original: de'i phyir zhes bshad do //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bshad do //
translated: Therefore, it is explained.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid mtha' dag ma tshang ba med par yongs su bcad pa'i phyir de rnam par rtog pa med pas myong ba'i phyir tshad ma gzhan 'jug pa mi 'thad do //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid mtha' dag ma tshang ba med par yongs su bcad pa'i phyir de rnam par rtog pa med pas myong ba'i phyir tshad ma gzhan 'jug pa mi 'thad do //
translated: Because of the complete determination of the entirety of its nature without incompleteness, it is not tenable that another valid cognition engages it, because it is experienced without conceptualization.

original: des na de ltar sgrub pa'i @162b phyogs la tshad ma gzhan 'jug pa ma yin par bsgrubs nas gzhan sel ba'i phyogs la 'thad par ston pa ni gzugs chos zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: des na de ltar sgrub pa'i @162b phyogs la tshad ma gzhan 'jug pa ma yin par bsgrubs nas gzhan sel ba'i phyogs la 'thad par ston pa ni gzugs chos zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore, having established that another valid cognition does not operate in the case of such an establishment, the demonstration of the feasibility in the case of the exclusion of other is the “form is a property-possessor” .

original: gal te 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis //
analyzed: gal te 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis //
translated: If, due to the cause of error,

original: yon tan gzhan sbyor mi byed na //
analyzed: yon tan gzhan sbyor mi byed na //
translated: one does not apply another property,

original: don gyi rang gi ngo bo gcig //
analyzed: don gyi rang gi ngo bo gcig //
translated: then the single intrinsic reality of the object

original: bdag nyid mngon sum yin ba la //
analyzed: bdag nyid mngon sum yin ba la //
translated: is directly perceived by itself.

original: tshad ma rnams kyis brtag bya gang //
analyzed: tshad ma rnams kyis brtag bya gang //
translated: What is to be examined by the valid cognitions

original: ma mthong cha gzhan ci zhig yod //
analyzed: ma mthong cha gzhan ci zhig yod //
translated: when one does not see another part?

original: ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba'o //
translated: This is what is said.

original: de'i don 'di yin te /
analyzed: de'i don 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows.

original: gang gi phyir 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis dngos po mthong ba la yang dngos po gzhan sgro 'dogs pa des na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis dngos po mthong ba la yang dngos po gzhan sgro 'dogs pa des na /
translated: Because of the cause of error, even when one sees an entity, one superimposes another entity on it.

original: de tshad ma rnams kyis brtag par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de tshad ma rnams kyis brtag par bya ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, that is to be examined by the valid cognitions.

original: de bas na rang bzhin gzhan sgro btags pas bskal pa'i dngos po'i bdag nyid rtogs par bya ba'i phyir tshad ma gzhan 'jug ste /
analyzed: de bas na rang bzhin gzhan sgro btags pas bskal pa'i dngos po'i bdag nyid rtogs par bya ba'i phyir tshad ma gzhan 'jug ste /
translated: Hence, another valid cognition operates in order to understand the nature of an entity that is isolated from the superimposition of another nature.

original: des na de sgro 'dogs pa bsal bas rtogs pa na tha dad pa'i don can gzhan sel ba'i yul can du 'grub pa yin no //
analyzed: des na de sgro 'dogs pa bsal bas rtogs pa na tha dad pa'i don can gzhan sel ba'i yul can du 'grub pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, when it is realized by the elimination of superimposition, it is established as the subject that has the object of other-exclusion that has a different meaning.

original: gal te nyams su myong bas rtogs pa'i dngos po nyid la ma mthong ba cung zad yod na /
analyzed: gal te nyams su myong bas rtogs pa'i dngos po nyid la ma mthong ba cung zad yod na /
translated: If there were even the slightest thing that is realized by experience that is not seen,

original: de la tshad ma gzhan 'jug par 'gyur ba yin na /
analyzed: de la tshad ma gzhan 'jug par 'gyur ba yin na /
translated: then another valid cognition would engage it.

original: cha med pa de la ma mthong ba 'ga' yang med na tshad ma gzhan 'jug pa med pa'i phyir sgrub pa'i tshad ma gzhan 'jug pa dgag pa ni rnam par gcod pa'i yul can la yang mtshungs so //
analyzed: cha med pa de la ma mthong ba 'ga' yang med na tshad ma gzhan 'jug pa med pa'i phyir sgrub pa'i tshad ma gzhan 'jug pa dgag pa ni rnam par gcod pa'i yul can la yang mtshungs so //
translated: But if there is nothing at all that is not seen in that partless thing, then another valid cognition does not engage it. Therefore, the refutation of the engagement of another valid cognition that establishes it is the same for the subject that excludes.

original: 'di ltar dngos po'i de kho na nyid mtha' dag mthong ba la ni 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis yon tan gzhan sbyor ba nyid re zhing mi srid de /
analyzed: 'di ltar dngos po'i de kho na nyid mtha' dag mthong ba la ni 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis yon tan gzhan sbyor ba nyid re zhing mi srid de /
translated: Thus, with regard to seeing the whole of the reality of things, it is not possible to hope for the application of another quality due to the reason of error.

original: rtag tu yod par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtag tu yod par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it would follow that it would always exist.

original: srid na yang mthong ba'i nus pa ma nyams pas yon tan gzhan sbyor ba khyad du bsad de /
analyzed: srid na yang mthong ba'i nus pa ma nyams pas yon tan gzhan sbyor ba khyad du bsad de /
translated: Even if it were possible, since the power of seeing is unimpaired, the application of another quality is disregarded.

original: rang gi yul yongs su rdzogs par bya ba tshad ma gzhan la ltos pa zlog par byed do //
analyzed: rang gi yul yongs su rdzogs par bya ba tshad ma gzhan la ltos pa zlog par byed do //
translated: It is the opposite of the complete ascertainment of its object, which depends on another valid cognition.

original: dper na bram ze'i khye'u la seng ge zhes dngos po mtha' dag mthong bzhin du yang sgro 'dogs pa tsam gyis skyes bu seng ge dang sbyor ba rang gi ngo bo 'dzin pa'i shes pa gzhan la ltos nas 'grub pa ma yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na bram ze'i khye'u la seng ge zhes dngos po mtha' dag mthong bzhin du yang sgro 'dogs pa tsam gyis skyes bu seng ge dang sbyor ba rang gi ngo bo 'dzin pa'i shes pa gzhan la ltos nas 'grub pa ma yin pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, even though one sees all the aspects of a person such as a young brahmin, one does not, on the basis of other cognitions that apprehend their own natures, establish the person as a lion by mere superimposition.

original: des na gal te 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis zhes ci ste brjod /
analyzed: des na gal te 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis zhes ci ste brjod /
translated: Therefore, why is it said, “due to the reason of error”?

original: 'di ltar 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan yod kyang de kho na nyid ma nyams na /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan yod kyang de kho na nyid ma nyams na /
translated: In this way, even if the reason for error exists, if reality is not impaired,

original: tshad ma gzhan gyis rtogs pa srid pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: tshad ma gzhan gyis rtogs pa srid pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: it is not possible for another valid cognition to realize it.

original: brjod @163a * //
analyzed: brjod @163a * //
translated: In response to this, it is said:

original: pa ; 'di la dngos po med par smra ba'i lta ba la ji ltar mthong bzhin pa'i rang bzhin tsam nyid 'jig pa dang skye ba dang skyed par byed pa yin par rigs pa las /
analyzed: pa ; 'di la dngos po med par smra ba'i lta ba la ji ltar mthong bzhin pa'i rang bzhin tsam nyid 'jig pa dang skye ba dang skyed par byed pa yin par rigs pa las /
translated: In this regard, in the view of the proponents of nonentity, it is reasonable that mere intrinsic reality, just as it is seen, is that which is destroyed, arises, and gives rise to other things.

original: de nyid skad cig ma la sogs par grub pa'i phyir nyams su myong ba'i dbang gis gzugs de mdun na gnas pa'i rang bzhin du snang ba nas gzugs nyid gsal ba yin gyi /
analyzed: de nyid skad cig ma la sogs par grub pa'i phyir nyams su myong ba'i dbang gis gzugs de mdun na gnas pa'i rang bzhin du snang ba nas gzugs nyid gsal ba yin gyi /
translated: Because it is established as momentary, etc., by the power of experience, form appears as the nature of something present before one.

original: skad cig ma la sogs pa ni ma yin no zhes brjod par mi nus so //
analyzed: skad cig ma la sogs pa ni ma yin no zhes brjod par mi nus so //
translated: One cannot say that form itself is manifest, but not the momentariness, etc.

original: skad cig ma nyid kyang gzugs kyi bdag nyid du gsal ba yin la /
analyzed: skad cig ma nyid kyang gzugs kyi bdag nyid du gsal ba yin la /
translated: Momentary is manifest as the nature of form,

original: gzugs kyang skad cig ma'i bdag nyid du yin no zhes bsnyad pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzugs kyang skad cig ma'i bdag nyid du yin no zhes bsnyad pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and form is the nature of momentariness.

original: des na don ji lta ba de kho na ltar don nyams su myong ba don rigs pa 'jug pas don ngo bo mtha' dag gis snang bar grub kyang nyams su myong ba rang yod pa tsam gyis ni mthar phyin pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: des na don ji lta ba de kho na ltar don nyams su myong ba don rigs pa 'jug pas don ngo bo mtha' dag gis snang bar grub kyang nyams su myong ba rang yod pa tsam gyis ni mthar phyin pa ma yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, just as the object is, just so is the experience of the object. Since the object is engaged by reason, the object is established as appearing by all its natures. However, the mere presence of experience is not the culmination.

original: 'on kyang 'du byed sgrub pas rjes su 'jug pa yin no ;
analyzed: 'on kyang 'du byed sgrub pas rjes su 'jug pa yin no ;
translated: Rather, it is the engagement through the accomplishment of the formative forces.

original: /'du byed las skyes pa'i rtogs pa yang rnam par rtog pa yin no //
analyzed: /'du byed las skyes pa'i rtogs pa yang rnam par rtog pa yin no //
translated: And the realization that arises from the formative forces is also conceptual.

original: des na gal te rnam par rtog pa yang nyams su myong ba bzhin du sgrub pa'i ngo bos don 'dzin na /🔽sngon po la sogs pa dang dbyer med pa'i skad cig ma la sogs pa'i rnam pa sngon po'i bdag nyid du gyur pa de'i rang gi ngo bo tsam 'dzin par 'gyur na de ltar yang ma yin te /
analyzed: des na gal te rnam par rtog pa yang nyams su myong ba bzhin du sgrub pa'i ngo bos don 'dzin na / sngon po la sogs pa dang dbyer med pa'i skad cig ma la sogs pa'i rnam pa sngon po'i bdag nyid du gyur pa de'i rang gi ngo bo tsam 'dzin par 'gyur na de ltar yang ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, if conceptual consciousness apprehends an object by the nature of the experience,🔽then it would apprehend the mere nature of the aspect that is the identity of blue, such as the momentariness that is inseparable from blue.

original: sngon po myong na sngon po'i rnam par rtog pa skyes pa na /
analyzed: sngon po myong na sngon po'i rnam par rtog pa skyes pa na /
translated: But that is not so, because when blue is experienced, when a conceptual consciousness of blue arises,

original: skad cig ma la sogs pa la the tshom za bas tshad ma gzhan la ltos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skad cig ma la sogs pa la the tshom za bas tshad ma gzhan la ltos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: it doubts momentariness and so on and therefore depends on another valid knowledge.

original: des na 'dis ni bdag nyid thams cad kyis nyams su myong zhing 'du byed pa las rtogs par gyur pa chos gcig tu byas nas nges pa byed do /
analyzed: des na 'dis ni bdag nyid thams cad kyis nyams su myong zhing 'du byed pa las rtogs par gyur pa chos gcig tu byas nas nges pa byed do /
translated: Therefore, it ascertains a single phenomenon that is understood from experience by its entire nature and from mental construction.

original: 'di lta ste gzugs nyid du'o //
analyzed: 'di lta ste gzugs nyid du'o //
translated: It is like this: it is just form.

original: des na 'di ltar dngos po'i rang bzhin nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid kyi rtogs pa med kyang 'dir rang bzhin gzhan gyis kyang dngos po la 'jug pa'i byed pa med par gyur na /
analyzed: des na 'di ltar dngos po'i rang bzhin nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid kyi rtogs pa med kyang 'dir rang bzhin gzhan gyis kyang dngos po la 'jug pa'i byed pa med par gyur na /
translated: Therefore, although there is no cognition that has the nature of the experience of the intrinsic reality of things, here, if the intrinsic reality of things is not engaged by another,

original: dngos po la sogs par rtogs pa bzhin du /
analyzed: dngos po la sogs par rtogs pa bzhin du /
translated: then just as the cognition of things and so on,

original: dngos po la brten pa ma yin pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos po la brten pa ma yin pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
translated: it would not be based on things at all.

original: gang gi tshe tha dad par byed pa nyid kyis don gyi ngo bo sngon po ma yin pa tsam las dbye ba'i phyir de'i gnyen por gyur pa dngos po'i @163b bdag nyid kyi sngon po tsam rtogs pas 'jug pa de'i tshe 'di 'jug pa tshad ma gzhan gyis
analyzed: gang gi tshe tha dad par byed pa nyid kyis don gyi ngo bo sngon po ma yin pa tsam las dbye ba'i phyir de'i gnyen por gyur pa dngos po'i @163b bdag nyid kyi sngon po tsam rtogs pas 'jug pa de'i tshe 'di 'jug pa tshad ma gzhan gyis
translated: When the nature of the object is differentiated by the differentiation itself, because of the mere non-blueness, the antidote to that is the mere blueness that has the nature of the thing. When it is engaged by the cognition, at that time, it is only tenable that the engagement of this valid knowledge

original: go skabs dang ldan par 'thad pa kho na'o //
analyzed: go skabs dang ldan par 'thad pa kho na'o //
translated: has an opportunity.

original: de'i phyir nyams su myong ba dang 'brel ba'i mthong ba sngon po ma yin pa tsam spangs par grub pa na skad cig ma yin pa la sogs pa dang / tha mi dad pa ldog pa'i tshad mas gzhan la ltos pa med pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir nyams su myong ba dang 'brel ba'i mthong ba sngon po ma yin pa tsam spangs par grub pa na skad cig ma yin pa la sogs pa dang / tha mi dad pa ldog pa'i tshad mas gzhan la ltos pa med pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, when it is established that the seeing that is related to experience excludes only the mere non-blue, it is not the case that the valid cognition that excludes the non-blue does not depend on another, such as momentariness.

original: blo ni rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: blo ni rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: The cognition is twofold:

original: gcig ni don gyi dbang gi don snang bas don ji lta ba bzhin kho nar 'jug pa yin la /
analyzed: gcig ni don gyi dbang gi don snang bas don ji lta ba bzhin kho nar 'jug pa yin la /
translated: One is governed by the object, and it engages in the object just as it is because it appears as the object.

original: gzhan ni rtogs pa po'i gzhan gyi dbang yin pa'i phyir don la mi ltos te /
analyzed: gzhan ni rtogs pa po'i gzhan gyi dbang yin pa'i phyir don la mi ltos te /
translated: The other does not depend on the object because it is governed by another, the cognizer.

original: gal te don gyi yul can ma yin pa nyid kyi don la don ji lta ba bzhin ma rtogs pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te don gyi yul can ma yin pa nyid kyi don la don ji lta ba bzhin ma rtogs pa yin na /
translated: If it is not the case that it has an object, then it does not understand the object just as it is.

original: 'dis don la brten pa'i tha snyad du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dis don la brten pa'i tha snyad du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: In that case, it would not be a convention that depends on the object.

original: des na 'di ni gzhan sel ba'i don can nyid kyis dngos po'i yul can yin pa'i phyir nyes pa 'ga' yang med do //
analyzed: des na 'di ni gzhan sel ba'i don can nyid kyis dngos po'i yul can yin pa'i phyir nyes pa 'ga' yang med do //
translated: Therefore, since it is a cognition that has an object that is the exclusion of another, there is no fault at all.

original: de lta na 'o na rnam par rtog pa ni 'khrul pa nyid kyi phyir na /
analyzed: de lta na 'o na rnam par rtog pa ni 'khrul pa nyid kyi phyir na /
translated: In that case, since conceptual cognition is mistaken,

original: dngos po'i bdag nyid sngon po dang skad cig ma la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis tha dad par rtogs pa des na don gyi ngo bo'i chos mtha' dag gis bdag nyid yin yang rnam pa gcig tu snang ba'i phyir nyams su myong ba'i rjes su 'brang pa'i rtogs
analyzed: dngos po'i bdag nyid sngon po dang skad cig ma la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis tha dad par rtogs pa des na don gyi ngo bo'i chos mtha' dag gis bdag nyid yin yang rnam pa gcig tu snang ba'i phyir nyams su myong ba'i rjes su 'brang pa'i rtogs
translated: it is understood that the nature of the object is different from the nature of the object, such as blue and momentary. Therefore, even though it is the nature of all phenomena of the nature of the object, it appears as a single aspect.

original: pas chos gcig gi bdag nyid du rtogs so //🔽des na nyams su myong ba skad cig ma la sogs pa rnams rnam pa gzhan du rtogs par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir de'i rgyu mtshan gyis skad cig ma'i rnam par rtog pa ma skyes pas na tshad ma gzhan la ltos pa'i phyir gzhan sel ba'i yul
analyzed: pas chos gcig gi bdag nyid du rtogs so // des na nyams su myong ba skad cig ma la sogs pa rnams rnam pa gzhan du rtogs par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir de'i rgyu mtshan gyis skad cig ma'i rnam par rtog pa ma skyes pas na tshad ma gzhan la ltos pa'i phyir gzhan sel ba'i yul
translated: Therefore, conceptual cognition that follows experience understands the nature of a single phenomenon.

original: can gyis ci bya /
analyzed: can gyis ci bya /
translated: Therefore, experience of momentariness and so on is not understood in another aspect. Since the reason for that is that the conceptual cognition of momentariness is not produced, what is the use of the object of other-exclusion, which depends on another valid cognition?

original: sgro 'dogs pa med kyang rgyu mtshan med pa nyid kyis ma rtogs par grub pa na tshad ma gzhan 'jug pa 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgro 'dogs pa med kyang rgyu mtshan med pa nyid kyis ma rtogs par grub pa na tshad ma gzhan 'jug pa 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But when it is established that there is no misapprehension, even though there is no superimposition, because there is no reason, then the engagement of another valid cognition is established.

original: de bas na sgrub pa'i ngo bo kho nas rtogs pa chos tsam la brten par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bas na sgrub pa'i ngo bo kho nas rtogs pa chos tsam la brten par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the mere object of knowledge is the basis of the realization that is the nature of the proof.

original: 'khrul pa'i phyir de ma rtogs so zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: 'khrul pa'i phyir de ma rtogs so zhe na ma yin te /
translated: If you say that it is not realized because of error, that is not so.

original: zhen pa la ltos te khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhen pa la ltos te khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is accepted in dependence on adherence.

original: de lta ma yin na rnam par gcod pa'i sgo nas kyang rtogs pa mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na rnam par gcod pa'i sgo nas kyang rtogs pa mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
