translated: If it were not so, then even by way of exclusion, realization would not be established.

original: de ltar ni mi nus te /🔽dngos po la brten pa yin na dngos po la yod pa'i skad cig ma la @164a * //
analyzed: de ltar ni mi nus te / dngos po la brten pa yin na dngos po la yod pa'i skad cig ma la @164a * //
translated: That is not possible,

original: sogs pa'i bdag nyid kyis tha dad par bslad par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sogs pa'i bdag nyid kyis tha dad par bslad par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because if it were based on an entity, it would not be adulterated by the difference of the nature of the entity, such as momentariness.

original: de'i yul gyi nyams su myong ba la brten pa'i phyir de la brten pa yin na yang tha dad pa ma yin pa bzhin du rang bzhin la phyin ci log par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i yul gyi nyams su myong ba la brten pa'i phyir de la brten pa yin na yang tha dad pa ma yin pa bzhin du rang bzhin la phyin ci log par 'gyur te /
translated: Because it is based on the experience of its object, it is based on that, but it is not different.

original: dngul la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dngul la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa bzhin no //
translated: It is like the conception of silver and so on.

original: sngon po ma yin pa la yang skad cig ma nyid rtogs pa'i phyir tha dad pa la 'khrul pa yin no zhe na ma yin te sngon po dang sngon po ma yin pa dag gis skad cig ma gcig nyid du 'khrul pa yang gzhan sel ba ma yin
analyzed: sngon po ma yin pa la yang skad cig ma nyid rtogs pa'i phyir tha dad pa la 'khrul pa yin no zhe na ma yin te sngon po dang sngon po ma yin pa dag gis skad cig ma gcig nyid du 'khrul pa yang gzhan sel ba ma yin
translated: If you say that it is a mistake about difference because non-blue is cognized as momentary, no, because the mistake of blue and non-blue as the same moment is also not a thing that is based on a thing.

original: par dngos po la brten pa nyid yin na /
analyzed: par dngos po la brten pa nyid yin na /
translated: If it is not an other-exclusion,

original: tha dad pa bslad pa bzhin mi 'grub par 'chad par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad pa bslad pa bzhin mi 'grub par 'chad par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: then it is not established as a mistake about difference, as will be explained.

original: de'i phyir tha dad pa tsam la byed pa dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni bzlog par bya ba mang po dag las sgra'o zhes de'i gnyen por gyur pa'i dngos po'i bdag nyid 'dzin pas gcig bzlog ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir tha dad pa tsam la byed pa dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni bzlog par bya ba mang po dag las sgra'o zhes de'i gnyen por gyur pa'i dngos po'i bdag nyid 'dzin pas gcig bzlog ste /
translated: Therefore, the conceptual thought that operates on mere difference, from among the many things to be refuted, is refuted by the apprehension of the nature of the thing that is the antidote to that.

original: mi rtag pa'o zhes de bzhin du gzhan sel ba na tha dad pa la bslad pa med kyang rang bzhin la bslad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi rtag pa'o zhes de bzhin du gzhan sel ba na tha dad pa la bslad pa med kyang rang bzhin la bslad par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, when the impermanent is apprehended, although there is no error in regard to difference, there is error in regard to the nature.

original: de ltar yang 'og nas bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar yang 'og nas bshad par bya'o //
translated: This will be explained later.

original: de'i phyir dngos po rtogs pa'i bdag nyid can gyi rnam par shes pa'i yul can grub pa la yang tha dad pa'i don gyi rtogs pa la brten nas sgro 'dogs srid pa dang tshad ma gzhan la ltos par 'thad pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir dngos po rtogs pa'i bdag nyid can gyi rnam par shes pa'i yul can grub pa la yang tha dad pa'i don gyi rtogs pa la brten nas sgro 'dogs srid pa dang tshad ma gzhan la ltos par 'thad pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, even when the cognition that has the nature of the understanding of things is established, it is possible that there will be superimposition in dependence on the understanding of a different object, and it is tenable that it depends on another valid cognition.

original: des na rgyu mtshan nges pa nyid las ma rtogs par grub pa na 'di mi brjod par 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'dir ma mthong ba sgrub pa'i phyir 'di bkod pa ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang sgrub pa'i ngo bos rtogs pa bsal ba na sgro 'dogs yod
analyzed: des na rgyu mtshan nges pa nyid las ma rtogs par grub pa na 'di mi brjod par 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'dir ma mthong ba sgrub pa'i phyir 'di bkod pa ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang sgrub pa'i ngo bos rtogs pa bsal ba na sgro 'dogs yod
translated: Therefore, when it is established that the reason is ascertained, then this is not stated. This is not stated in order to prove what is not seen here, but rather, when the object of knowledge is eliminated by the nature of the proof, if there is superimposition,

original: na / de zlog par byed pa nyid kyis tshad ma dag gis brtag pa srid par brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: na / de zlog par byed pa nyid kyis tshad ma dag gis brtag pa srid par brjod pa yin te /
translated: then it is said that it is possible to investigate with valid cognitions, by the very act of refuting that.

original: ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis srid par bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis srid par bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is shown to be possible in the way that has been explained.

original: gang zhig dngos po gang las tha dad pa de ni de las yon tan gzhan yin no //
analyzed: gang zhig dngos po gang las tha dad pa de ni de las yon tan gzhan yin no //
translated: That which is different from a thing is a different quality from that.

original: nges pa'i rang bzhin gyi dngos po ltos nas kyang de ma yin pa'i rang bzhin de las tha dad pa yin no //
analyzed: nges pa'i rang bzhin gyi dngos po ltos nas kyang de ma yin pa'i rang bzhin de las tha dad pa yin no //
translated: Even in dependence on a thing that has a definite nature, that which is not that nature is different from it.

original: des na sngon po'i rang bzhin gyis dngos po las ser po gzhan la /
analyzed: des na sngon po'i rang bzhin gyis dngos po las ser po gzhan la /
translated: Therefore, yellow, which is different from a thing that has the nature of blue,

original: de bzhin du skad cig mar 'jig pa la ni mi 'jig pa nges pa'i 'bras bu byed pa las ni 'bras bu med pa gzhan yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du skad cig mar 'jig pa la ni mi 'jig pa nges pa'i 'bras bu byed pa las ni 'bras bu med pa gzhan yin no //
translated: Likewise, the non-disintegration of the momentary is different from the effect of the disintegration.

original: 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan yod pa las ni dngos po rang @164b gi ngo bos ji ltar gnas pa las phyin ci log tu rtogs par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan yod pa las ni dngos po rang @164b gi ngo bos ji ltar gnas pa las phyin ci log tu rtogs par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: From the existence of the basis of error, there is the erroneous conception of the thing as it is not, in accordance with its intrinsic reality.

original: des na don gyi ngo bo gcig yin pa'i phyir de'i rtogs pa rang bzhin gcig kho nar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na don gyi ngo bo gcig yin pa'i phyir de'i rtogs pa rang bzhin gcig kho nar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, because the nature of the object is one, the conception of it is only of one nature.

original: 'di la phyin ci log tu sgro 'dogs pa ni mang ba yin te /
analyzed: 'di la phyin ci log tu sgro 'dogs pa ni mang ba yin te /
translated: In this regard, there are many superimpositions of error,

original: de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i don rnams mang ba'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i don rnams mang ba'i phyir ro ;
translated: because there are many objects that are not of its nature.

original: / des na de la phyin ci log tu dang tha mi dad pa sel bar byed pa'i 'bras bu can gyi tshad ma dag kyang mang po kho na'o //
analyzed: / des na de la phyin ci log tu dang tha mi dad pa sel bar byed pa'i 'bras bu can gyi tshad ma dag kyang mang po kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, there are many valid cognitions that have the effect of eliminating the superimposition of error and nondifference.

original: ji ltar rang gi ngo bos gzhan gyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa gzhan la gzhan sbyor /
analyzed: ji ltar rang gi ngo bos gzhan gyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa gzhan la gzhan sbyor /
translated: How can that which is empty of the intrinsic reality of another be joined to another?

original: gzhan gyi ngo bos rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan gyi ngo bos rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhe na ma yin te /
translated: Because it is realized by the nature of another?🔽No.🔽

original: de ma rtogs pas de gzhan gyi ngo bor rtogs pa mi 'grub pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de ma rtogs pas de gzhan gyi ngo bor rtogs pa mi 'grub pa'i phyir te /
translated: But it is not so, because if one does not understand the other, it is not established that one understands the other’s nature,

original: gzhan tsam rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan tsam rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because one understands mere otherness.

original: de rtogs na ni gnyi ga yang rtogs pa'i phyir khyad par dang khyad par can gyi dngos po nyid sbyor ba yin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de rtogs na ni gnyi ga yang rtogs pa'i phyir khyad par dang khyad par can gyi dngos po nyid sbyor ba yin par 'gyur te /
translated: If one understands that, then one understands both, and so the relation of qualifier and qualificand would be established.

original: des na rtogs pa nyid tshad ma gzhan la ji ltar ltos par 'gyur /
analyzed: des na rtogs pa nyid tshad ma gzhan la ji ltar ltos par 'gyur /
translated: So how could understanding itself depend on another valid cognition?

original: de bas na yon tan gzhan sbyor yang tshad ma gzhan la ltos pa ma yin no zhes dogs na /
analyzed: de bas na yon tan gzhan sbyor yang tshad ma gzhan la ltos pa ma yin no zhes dogs na /
translated: Therefore, even if one applies another quality, it does not depend on another valid cognition.

original: nya phyis la dngul gyi rnam pa ltar zhes smos so //
analyzed: nya phyis la dngul gyi rnam pa ltar zhes smos so //
translated: To respond to this qualm, he says, “Like mother of pearl appearing as silver.”

original: dper na nya phyis la 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis dngul gyi rnam par sbyar ba bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na nya phyis la 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis dngul gyi rnam par sbyar ba bzhin no //
translated: For example, due to the cause of error, mother of pearl is applied as silver.

original: khyad par dang khyad par can bzhin du nya phyis rtogs bzhin pa'i rang bzhin dngul gyi rnam pa dang sbyor ba ni ma yin la /
analyzed: khyad par dang khyad par can bzhin du nya phyis rtogs bzhin pa'i rang bzhin dngul gyi rnam pa dang sbyor ba ni ma yin la /
translated: But it is not that the nature of mother of pearl, which is being understood as mother of pearl, is applied as the aspect of silver.

original: ma rtogs pas dngul gyi rang bzhin du ma rtogs pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: ma rtogs pas dngul gyi rang bzhin du ma rtogs pa yang ma yin no //
translated: It is not that it is not realized as having the nature of silver.

original: rtogs pa de rdul tsam gyi yul yin yang nya phyis kyi rang bzhin du rjes su zhugs par snang ba'i phyir nya phyis su gyur pa'i dngul gyi rnam par rtog pa nyid do //
analyzed: rtogs pa de rdul tsam gyi yul yin yang nya phyis kyi rang bzhin du rjes su zhugs par snang ba'i phyir nya phyis su gyur pa'i dngul gyi rnam par rtog pa nyid do //
translated: Although that realization has an object that is as small as an atom, it appears to be engaged in the nature of mother-of-pearl, and so it is a conceptual cognition that has become silver that is mother-of-pearl.

original: gal te skad cig ma nyid la sogs pa'i rnam pa mang po gcig nyid ngo bo gzhan 'byed pa lhur len pa'i rtogs pas rang bzhin du byas te /
analyzed: gal te skad cig ma nyid la sogs pa'i rnam pa mang po gcig nyid ngo bo gzhan 'byed pa lhur len pa'i rtogs pas rang bzhin du byas te /
translated: If one were to take as the nature of something a cognition that is intent on distinguishing many aspects, such as momentariness, as being a single entity,

original: skad cig ma nyid la sogs pa'i spyod yul can nyams su myong ba'i byed pa nyams par byas pa na sgro 'dogs par 'thad kyi gzhan du ni mdun na gnas pa'i rang bzhin du gsal ba'i ngo bo la rang bzhin gzhan sgro 'dogs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: skad cig ma nyid la sogs pa'i spyod yul can nyams su myong ba'i byed pa nyams par byas pa na sgro 'dogs par 'thad kyi gzhan du ni mdun na gnas pa'i rang bzhin du gsal ba'i ngo bo la rang bzhin gzhan sgro 'dogs pa ma yin te /
translated: then it would be possible to superimpose something on the object of experience of momentariness, etc., by impairing the function of the experience. But it is not possible to superimpose another nature on the nature that is clearly manifest in front of one,

original: rtag tu de yod par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtag tu de yod par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow that it would always exist.

original: nya phyis nyams su myong ba la dngul gyi rnam par sgro 'dogs pa la ni rnam pa 'di srid pa ma yin te /🔽rang @165a * //
analyzed: nya phyis nyams su myong ba la dngul gyi rnam par sgro 'dogs pa la ni rnam pa 'di srid pa ma yin te / rang @165a * //
translated: But in the case of the experience of mother-of-pearl as silver, such a form is not possible.

original: gi rnam pa 'gal bas snang ba la 'gal ba rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gi rnam pa 'gal bas snang ba la 'gal ba rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the form of the mother-of-pearl is incompatible with the form of silver, and there is no cognition of incompatibility in the appearance.

original: de lta ma yin na gnod par byed pa skye ba nyid mi 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na gnod par byed pa skye ba nyid mi 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, the arising of the invalidating cognition would not be established.

original: skad cig ma ma yin pa'i rnam pa ni dngos su 'gal ba yin yang dngos po'i rang bzhin tsam du rtogs pas na 'gal ba med pa'i phyir 'thad pa kho na'o //
analyzed: skad cig ma ma yin pa'i rnam pa ni dngos su 'gal ba yin yang dngos po'i rang bzhin tsam du rtogs pas na 'gal ba med pa'i phyir 'thad pa kho na'o //
translated: But in the case of the form of the nonmomentary, although it is incompatible with the nature of an entity, there is no incompatibility because it is understood as the mere nature of an entity. Therefore, it is quite reasonable.

original: des na ji ltar nya phyis la dngul du sgro 'dogs zhes dogs na /
analyzed: des na ji ltar nya phyis la dngul du sgro 'dogs zhes dogs na /
translated: Therefore, how can it be said that mother-of-pearl is imagined to be silver?

original: gzugs chos mthun pa mthong ba las zhes smos so //
analyzed: gzugs chos mthun pa mthong ba las zhes smos so //
translated: It is said, “from seeing a similarity of attributes.”

original: rtogs pa po'i bsam pa la ltos te /
analyzed: rtogs pa po'i bsam pa la ltos te /
translated: In dependence on the thought of the cognizer,

original: dngul gyi rang bzhin ji lta bu nyid de lta bu nya phyis la yang yod pas na chos mthun par brjod de /
analyzed: dngul gyi rang bzhin ji lta bu nyid de lta bu nya phyis la yang yod pas na chos mthun par brjod de /
translated: the nature of silver exists in mother-of-pearl in the same way that it does in silver. Therefore, it is said to be similar in attributes,

original: ba lang dang ba men bzhin no //
analyzed: ba lang dang ba men bzhin no //
translated: like a cow and a gayal.

original: de mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is seen.

original: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
translated: This is what is said:

original: dkar ba la sogs pa chos mthun pa dag gis nya phyis kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de dngul la yod pa yin te /
analyzed: dkar ba la sogs pa chos mthun pa dag gis nya phyis kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de dngul la yod pa yin te /
translated: Whatever is the nature of a mother-of-pearl shell, which is similar to white, etc., exists in silver.

original: bum pa gnyis la lto ba yangs pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa yod pa bzhin nam /
analyzed: bum pa gnyis la lto ba yangs pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa yod pa bzhin nam /
translated: Just as the two pots have the aspect of a broad belly, etc.,

original: mtho yor dang mi dag la gyen du 'greng ba'i rnam pa yod pa bzhin no //
analyzed: mtho yor dang mi dag la gyen du 'greng ba'i rnam pa yod pa bzhin no //
translated: or just as the cairn and the man have the aspect of standing upright.

original: de tsam gyi rnam pa'i rjes su byed pa'i mngon sum skyes pas dngul gyi rnam pa dang tha dad par byed pa'i rnam pa ma bzung ba'i phyir dngul du sgro 'dogs par 'thad pa nyid do //
analyzed: de tsam gyi rnam pa'i rjes su byed pa'i mngon sum skyes pas dngul gyi rnam pa dang tha dad par byed pa'i rnam pa ma bzung ba'i phyir dngul du sgro 'dogs par 'thad pa nyid do //
translated: Because the direct perception that arises in conformity with that aspect does not apprehend the aspect that distinguishes silver, it is possible to superimpose silver.

original: mtho yor gyi thun mong ma yin pa'i chos ma bzung bas skyes bur sgro 'dogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: mtho yor gyi thun mong ma yin pa'i chos ma bzung bas skyes bur sgro 'dogs pa bzhin no //
translated: Just as it is possible to superimpose a man because of not apprehending the uncommon attributes of the cairn.

original: tha dad par byed pa'i rnam pa gzung na ni sgro 'dogs mi srid pa kho na'o //
analyzed: tha dad par byed pa'i rnam pa gzung na ni sgro 'dogs mi srid pa kho na'o //
translated: But if the aspect that distinguishes were apprehended, then superimposition would be impossible.

original: 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan med na ni gnyi ga la yang yod pa'i ngo bo tsam bzung ba la the tshom du 'gyur te dper na gyen du 'greng ba nyid bzung ba na mtho yor dang skyes bur the tshom za ba bzhin no //
analyzed: 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan med na ni gnyi ga la yang yod pa'i ngo bo tsam bzung ba la the tshom du 'gyur te dper na gyen du 'greng ba nyid bzung ba na mtho yor dang skyes bur the tshom za ba bzhin no //
translated: If there were no basis for error, then there would be doubt about the apprehension of the mere nature that is common to both, just as when one apprehends the mere fact of something standing upright, one doubts whether it is a cairn or a man.

original: nya phyis la yang srid pa'i ngo bo gcig la nges par gzung ba nyid 'khrul pa bzhin no //
analyzed: nya phyis la yang srid pa'i ngo bo gcig la nges par gzung ba nyid 'khrul pa bzhin no //
translated: And just as there is error in apprehending the nature of a single entity that is possible in a mother-of-pearl shell,

original: tha dad par byed pa'i rnam pa ma bzung bar ji ltar rtogs she na /
analyzed: tha dad par byed pa'i rnam pa ma bzung bar ji ltar rtogs she na /
translated: How is it understood without apprehending a feature that distinguishes it?

original: ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not understood.

original: de ltar snang ba ni de rtogs par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar snang ba ni de rtogs par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it follows that what appears is understood.

original: 'o na ji ltar don gyi rang gi ngo bo gcig ces bya ba la sogs pa bshad ce na /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar don gyi rang gi ngo bo gcig ces bya ba la sogs pa bshad ce na /
translated: Well then, how is it explained that “the nature of a single object” and so on?

original: chos gang zhig rang bzhin gang la brten nas tshad ma dag gis brtag pa de ni de bzung ba na ma bzung ba mi srid de /
analyzed: chos gang zhig rang bzhin gang la brten nas tshad ma dag gis brtag pa de ni de bzung ba na ma bzung ba mi srid de /
translated: When a phenomenon that depends on a certain nature is investigated by valid knowledge, it is impossible that it is not apprehended when it is apprehended.

original: sgra la sogs pa bzung ba skad cig ma nyid @165b la sogs pa bzhin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir de skad bshad do //
analyzed: sgra la sogs pa bzung ba skad cig ma nyid @165b la sogs pa bzhin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir de skad bshad do //
translated: The word also is used to show that the object is momentary, like the sound, etc. that are grasped.

original: cha shas kyis 'dra ba mi srid pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: cha shas kyis 'dra ba mi srid pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not impossible for there to be similarity by way of part.

original: de gsal ba yang 'dra ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: de gsal ba yang 'dra ba nyid yin no //
translated: The manifestation is also similar.

original: 'grel pa ni gal te zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'grel pa ni gal te zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The commentary is: If...

original: mdo bzhin du gzhung snga ma dang 'brel te /
analyzed: mdo bzhin du gzhung snga ma dang 'brel te /
translated: The text is connected with the previous text according to the sutra.

original: dngos po'i de bzhin nyid thams cad mthong ba can la yang yon tan gzhan sbyor bar mi byed na'o //
analyzed: dngos po'i de bzhin nyid thams cad mthong ba can la yang yon tan gzhan sbyor bar mi byed na'o //
translated: If one who sees the suchness of all things does not apply other qualities,

original: ngo bo gzhan dang 'gal ba nyid kyis rnam pa gzhan mdun na gnas pa'i rang bzhin du gsal ba'i rang bzhin du de nye bar ji ltar sbyor zhe na /
analyzed: ngo bo gzhan dang 'gal ba nyid kyis rnam pa gzhan mdun na gnas pa'i rang bzhin du gsal ba'i rang bzhin du de nye bar ji ltar sbyor zhe na /
translated: how can one apply another nature to the nature that is manifest in front, since that is contradictory to another nature?

original: 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis zhes smos so //
analyzed: 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis zhes smos so //
translated: The word because is stated.

original: de'i nus pa bstan pa'i phyir khyad par blangs pa ni /
analyzed: de'i nus pa bstan pa'i phyir khyad par blangs pa ni /
translated: In order to show its power, the distinction is taken up.

original: de ltar nges pa'i gags su gyur pa zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar nges pa'i gags su gyur pa zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The word thus is stated.

original: snang bzhin pa'i rang bzhin nyid ni phyin ci log tu rtogs par srid pa ma yin no //
analyzed: snang bzhin pa'i rang bzhin nyid ni phyin ci log tu rtogs par srid pa ma yin no //
translated: The nature of what is appearing cannot possibly be understood in a distorted way.

original: des na 'khrul pa'i rgyu rnams 'khrul pa'i rgyur mi 'gyur ba nyid do //
analyzed: des na 'khrul pa'i rgyu rnams 'khrul pa'i rgyur mi 'gyur ba nyid do //
translated: Therefore, the causes of error do not become the causes of error.

original: nges pa'i gags su gyur pa'i 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis ni snang ba'i chos gcig gi mthar thug par byed pa des na chos gzhan la dogs pa'am 'khrul par 'gyur ba kho na'o //
analyzed: nges pa'i gags su gyur pa'i 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis ni snang ba'i chos gcig gi mthar thug par byed pa des na chos gzhan la dogs pa'am 'khrul par 'gyur ba kho na'o //
translated: The causes of error that are the obstacles to certainty make the one phenomenon that appears reach its end. Therefore, it is only in other phenomena that there is doubt or error.

original: rgyu mtshan de dag gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan de dag gang yin zhe na /
translated: What are those reasons?

original: chos tha mi dad pa zhes brjod do //
analyzed: chos tha mi dad pa zhes brjod do //
translated: It is said that phenomena are not different.

original: des na de ltar mngon sum gyis 'khrul pa'i go skabs phye ba na /
analyzed: des na de ltar mngon sum gyis 'khrul pa'i go skabs phye ba na /
translated: Therefore, in that way, when direct perception opens the opportunity for error,

original: 'khrul pa la sogs pa'i rgyu rnams bdag nyid ji lta bur rgyur 'gyur ba'i phyir de nyid gtsor 'khrul pa'i rgyu yin par brjod do //
analyzed: 'khrul pa la sogs pa'i rgyu rnams bdag nyid ji lta bur rgyur 'gyur ba'i phyir de nyid gtsor 'khrul pa'i rgyu yin par brjod do //
translated: the causes of error, etc., become the causes of error in just the way they are. Therefore, they are said to be the main causes of error.

original: ji ltar gnyi ga mi snang bar gzhan gzhan du sbyor te gzhan tsam rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhe na zhes snga ma bzhin du dogs pa bsu nas lan 'debs pa ni de ltar nya phyis la zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar gnyi ga mi snang bar gzhan gzhan du sbyor te gzhan tsam rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhe na zhes snga ma bzhin du dogs pa bsu nas lan 'debs pa ni de ltar nya phyis la zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: In response to this objection, the text says, “In the same way, in the case of mother-of-pearl . . .”

original: der nya phyis snang ba yang ma yin pa dngul gyi rnam par mi sbyor ba yang ma yin no //
analyzed: der nya phyis snang ba yang ma yin pa dngul gyi rnam par mi sbyor ba yang ma yin no //
translated: Here, the mother-of-pearl is not perceived as silver.

original: de nyid bshad pa ni nya phyis la ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid bshad pa ni nya phyis la ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is explained in the line “The mother-of-pearl is not perceived as silver.”

original: de ltar dngul gyi rnam pa sbyar ba'i nya phyis la ngo bo gnyis yod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar dngul gyi rnam pa sbyar ba'i nya phyis la ngo bo gnyis yod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The mother-of-pearl is not perceived as having two natures, as silver and as mother-of-pearl.

original: rang bzhin gnyis po de yang mtshungs pa dang ste /
analyzed: rang bzhin gnyis po de yang mtshungs pa dang ste /
translated: The two natures are similar,

original: gang bzung na dngul du sgro 'dogs par 'gyur ba nya phyis dang dngul la yang srid pa gang yin pa de ni gcig yin la /
analyzed: gang bzung na dngul du sgro 'dogs par 'gyur ba nya phyis dang dngul la yang srid pa gang yin pa de ni gcig yin la /
translated: in that both the mother-of-pearl and the silver have the potential to be perceived as silver.

original: khyad par can dang dngul gyi ngo bo nyid ni gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: khyad par can dang dngul gyi ngo bo nyid ni gnyis pa'o //
translated: The first is the nature of the mother-of-pearl, and the second is the nature of the silver.

original: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being said:

original: 'dir gnyis snang ba na sbyor ba ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'dir gnyis snang ba na sbyor ba ni ma yin gyi /
translated: Here, the application is not to the appearance of two,

original: @166a * // 'on kyang dngul gyi rnam pa tsam du snang ba yod pa yin no //
analyzed: @166a * // 'on kyang dngul gyi rnam pa tsam du snang ba yod pa yin no //
translated: but rather to the existence of the mere appearance of silver.

original: gtan tshigs bshad pa ni de ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs bshad pa ni de ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The reason is stated: “because of the appearance of the form of silver.”

original: spyi'i ngo bo dang dngul gyi rnam pa gsal bar 'gyur na /
analyzed: spyi'i ngo bo dang dngul gyi rnam pa gsal bar 'gyur na /
translated: If the universal and the form of silver were manifest,

original: dngul tsam zhig gsal ba yin no //
analyzed: dngul tsam zhig gsal ba yin no //
translated: then only silver would be manifest.

original: de ltar ma yin na gnyis snang bar mi 'grub bo zhes bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar ma yin na gnyis snang bar mi 'grub bo zhes bshad pa ni /
translated: If it were not so, the appearance of two would not be established.

original: bye brag tu ma rtogs na ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bye brag tu ma rtogs na ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is explained in the words, “If the particular were not apprehended.”

original: 'on nya phyis la dngul gyi rnam par sbyor zhe na /
analyzed: 'on nya phyis la dngul gyi rnam par sbyor zhe na /
translated: But if the particular were apprehended, then the form of silver would be applied to the mother-of-pearl.

original: lta bas na zhes smos so //
analyzed: lta bas na zhes smos so //
translated: “Because of the appearance of the form of silver.”

original: rtogs pa po nya phyis kyi gzugs mthong bas khyad par kho na mthong ngo //
analyzed: rtogs pa po nya phyis kyi gzugs mthong bas khyad par kho na mthong ngo //
translated: The apprehender, seeing the form of the mother-of-pearl, sees only the particular.

original: khyad par ma yin pa'i nya phyis kyi gzugs med pas na khyad par gyi ci zhig bya zhe na /
analyzed: khyad par ma yin pa'i nya phyis kyi gzugs med pas na khyad par gyi ci zhig bya zhe na /
translated: Since the form of the mother-of-pearl, which is not the particular, does not exist, what is the use of the particular?

original: 'dir dogs pa yod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dir dogs pa yod pa yin te /
translated: Here there is a doubt.

original: dngul gyi ngo bo la mi srid pa'i nya phyis kyi rnam pa bzung na dngul du sgro 'dogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngul gyi ngo bo la mi srid pa'i nya phyis kyi rnam pa bzung na dngul du sgro 'dogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If the form of a mother-of-pearl, which is impossible in silver, is grasped, silver is not misapprehended.

original: dngul la yod pa bzung yang de'i phyi ni ma yin no zhes dogs par bya ba yod pa'i phyir khyad par zhes smos so //
analyzed: dngul la yod pa bzung yang de'i phyi ni ma yin no zhes dogs par bya ba yod pa'i phyir khyad par zhes smos so //
translated: Even if what exists in silver is grasped, there is doubt that it is not its external form. Therefore, the word “distinctive” is mentioned.

original: gal te yang de lta bu dngul yang srid mod kyi /
analyzed: gal te yang de lta bu dngul yang srid mod kyi /
translated: Even though such silver is possible,

original: de lta na nya phyis la yod pa gang yin pa de ni dngul la yod pa ma yin la dngul la yod pa ma yin pa de yang nya phyis la med do //
analyzed: de lta na nya phyis la yod pa gang yin pa de ni dngul la yod pa ma yin la dngul la yod pa ma yin pa de yang nya phyis la med do //
translated: what exists in mother-of-pearl does not exist in silver, and what does not exist in silver also does not exist in mother-of-pearl.

original: de ltar na yang dkar zhing 'tsher ba'i rnam pa ni nya phyis la yod cing dngul la yang yod pa kho na'o /
analyzed: de ltar na yang dkar zhing 'tsher ba'i rnam pa ni nya phyis la yod cing dngul la yang yod pa kho na'o /
translated: However, the form of white luster exists in mother-of-pearl and also exists in silver.

original: des na khyad par zhes de'i rang bzhin brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: des na khyad par zhes de'i rang bzhin brjod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, “distinctive” is mentioned, expressing its nature.

original: gnyi ga srid pa'i ngo bo ni tha dad par byed pa thun mong ma yin pa'i ngo bo bzung ba med par gsal ba nges pa la rtogs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gnyi ga srid pa'i ngo bo ni tha dad par byed pa thun mong ma yin pa'i ngo bo bzung ba med par gsal ba nges pa la rtogs pa ma yin te /
translated: The nature that is possible in both is not grasped as the distinctive, uncommon nature that distinguishes them. Without that, the ascertainment of the manifestation is not understood.

original: ji skad bshad pa gyen du 'greng ba nyid bzhin no //🔽de la ni 'khyor ba dang khong gseng can la sogs pa'am /
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa gyen du 'greng ba nyid bzhin no // de la ni 'khyor ba dang khong gseng can la sogs pa'am /
translated: It is just as when it is said that something is standing upright.🔽In that case, it is understood that it is standing upright because it is not bent, hollow, and so on,

original: rkang lag la sogs pa bzung bas gyen du 'greng ba de nges par rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: rkang lag la sogs pa bzung bas gyen du 'greng ba de nges par rtogs pa yin no //
translated: or because it is supported by feet, hands, and so on.

original: de 'dir de lta bu'i rnam pa 'dzin pa ni khyad par gyi ngo bor nges pa'i rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: de 'dir de lta bu'i rnam pa 'dzin pa ni khyad par gyi ngo bor nges pa'i rtogs pa yin no //
translated: Here, the apprehension of the form of something in that way is the ascertainment of the nature of a particular.

original: des na gal te khyad par gyi ngo bo kho na mthong mod kyi da lta na yang khyad par gyi rnam pa 'dzin pa'i nges pa'i rkyan ma tshang ba'i phyir khyad par gyi ngo bo gtan la ma phebs pas de dngul la yod do //
analyzed: des na gal te khyad par gyi ngo bo kho na mthong mod kyi da lta na yang khyad par gyi rnam pa 'dzin pa'i nges pa'i rkyan ma tshang ba'i phyir khyad par gyi ngo bo gtan la ma phebs pas de dngul la yod do //
translated: Therefore, if one sees only the nature of a particular, but the conditions for the ascertainment that apprehends the form of a particular are not complete, then the nature of the particular is not ascertained, and one thinks that it exists in silver.

original: des na de'i spyi mthong ngo snyam du rlom par byed do zhes bshad do //
analyzed: des na de'i spyi mthong ngo snyam du rlom par byed do zhes bshad do //
translated: Therefore, it is explained that one imagines that one sees its universal.

original: 'di skad brjod pa yin te khyad par gyi rnam pa dang 'bral ba'i phyir der de lta bu'i rang bzhin du snang ba dngul la @166b yang srid pa gang yin pa de rgyu mtshan 'ga' zhig las nges pa thob ste /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod pa yin te khyad par gyi rnam pa dang 'bral ba'i phyir der de lta bu'i rang bzhin du snang ba dngul la @166b yang srid pa gang yin pa de rgyu mtshan 'ga' zhig las nges pa thob ste /
translated: This is what is being said: Because it is free from the aspect of a distinguishing feature, the appearance of that nature in silver is possible. That is ascertained from some cause.

original: 'gal ba med pa snang ba la dngul du sgro 'dogs pa yin no zhes bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: 'gal ba med pa snang ba la dngul du sgro 'dogs pa yin no zhes bshad pa yin no //
translated: The superimposition of silver on the appearance of something that is not silver is not contradictory.

original: de'i phyir dngul du sgro 'dogs so zhes bya ba ni ji ltar snang bzhin ba 'gal ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i phyir dngul du sgro 'dogs so zhes bya ba ni ji ltar snang bzhin ba 'gal ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Therefore, the statement “It is a superimposition of silver” means that it is contradictory to the way it appears.

original: dngul du sgro 'dogs pa ni nya phyis kyi yul gyis rnam par bcad nas dngul du snang ba'o //
analyzed: dngul du sgro 'dogs pa ni nya phyis kyi yul gyis rnam par bcad nas dngul du snang ba'o //
translated: The superimposition of silver is the appearance of silver, having eliminated the object of mother-of-pearl.

original: des na de ltar sgro 'dogs pa'i skabs phye bas na de myong ba de'i rang bzhin gyi yul non pas der snang ba'i phyir mi snang ba bzhin du yon tan gzhan sgro 'dogs par 'thad pa yin no zhes bsgrubs te /
analyzed: des na de ltar sgro 'dogs pa'i skabs phye bas na de myong ba de'i rang bzhin gyi yul non pas der snang ba'i phyir mi snang ba bzhin du yon tan gzhan sgro 'dogs par 'thad pa yin no zhes bsgrubs te /
translated: Therefore, since the occasion of superimposition is opened up in that way, it is established that it is tenable to superimpose another property on the appearance of that, since the object of the nature of the experience of that is covered.

original: skabs su bab pa'i yul gyi dbang du byas nas kyang bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin du zhes smos so //
analyzed: skabs su bab pa'i yul gyi dbang du byas nas kyang bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin du zhes smos so //
translated: And in order to indicate the object that is at issue, he says, in the same way.

original: nya phyis bzhin du gzhan bum pa la sogs pa la yang gnas par 'khrul lo //
analyzed: nya phyis bzhin du gzhan bum pa la sogs pa la yang gnas par 'khrul lo //
translated: One mistakes the reflection of a face in a mirror as being the face itself, and one mistakes the reflection of an object in a crystal as being the object itself. One mistakes the reflection of a form in water as being the form itself, and one mistakes the reflection of a form in a mirror as being the form itself. One mistakes the reflection of an object in a crystal as being the object itself. One mistakes the reflection of a form in water as being the form itself, and one mistakes the reflection of a form in a mirror as being the form itself. One mistakes the reflection of an object in a crystal as being the object itself. One mistakes the reflection of a form in water as being the form itself, and one mistakes the reflection of a form in a mirror as being the form itself. One mistakes the reflection of an object in a crystal as being the object itself. One mistakes the reflection of a form in water as being the form itself, and one mistakes the reflection of a form in a mirror as being the form itself. One mistakes the reflection of an object in a crystal as being the object itself. One mistakes the reflection of a form in water as being the form itself, and one mistakes the reflection of a form in a mirror as being the form itself. One mistakes the reflection of an object in a crystal as being the object itself. One mistakes the reflection of a form in water as being the form itself, and one mistakes the reflection of a form in a mirror as being the form itself. One mistakes the reflection of an object in a crystal as being the object itself.

original: nges pa'i gags su gyur pa 'khrul pa'i rgyu bshad pa ni thad dad pa nyid du ma 'phrigs pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nges pa'i gags su gyur pa 'khrul pa'i rgyu bshad pa ni thad dad pa nyid du ma 'phrigs pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The cause of error, which is the obstruction to ascertainment, is stated to be the failure to discern precisely.

original: chos kyi rang bzhin ni re zhig tha dad pa med pa nyid kyi phyir tha dad par ma rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi rang bzhin ni re zhig tha dad pa med pa nyid kyi phyir tha dad par ma rtogs pa yin no //
translated: The nature of a thing is not, to begin with, discerned as distinct.

original: skad cig gi dbye bas byas pa'i tha dad pa ni tshu rol mthong bas mi rtogs te /
analyzed: skad cig gi dbye bas byas pa'i tha dad pa ni tshu rol mthong bas mi rtogs te /
translated: The distinction that is made by the division of moments is not discerned by one who has limited vision,

original: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dag dang da ltar gyi skad cig snang bar mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dag dang da ltar gyi skad cig snang bar mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because he does not apprehend the past and future moments, which are not manifest.

original: da ltar gyi rang bzhin 'dzin pa las ni tshu rol mthong pa dang rnal 'byor pa 'dzin pa mtshungs pa kho na'o //
analyzed: da ltar gyi rang bzhin 'dzin pa las ni tshu rol mthong pa dang rnal 'byor pa 'dzin pa mtshungs pa kho na'o //
translated: The limited vision and the yogic perception are the same in so far as they apprehend the present nature of a thing.🔽 But the yogic perception is superior to the limited vision in so far as it apprehends the past and future moments, which are not manifest.

original: mthong ba'i khyad par ma brjod par ni rnam par rtog pa skyed pa dang ma skyed pa brjod par mi nus so //
analyzed: mthong ba'i khyad par ma brjod par ni rnam par rtog pa skyed pa dang ma skyed pa brjod par mi nus so //
translated: But without mentioning the difference in the perception, one cannot say that the conception is produced or not produced.

original: de ltar yang gal te til mar la sogs pa zad pa'i mar me bzhin du ngo bo ma dmigs na de gnas par 'khrul par mi 'gyur ba zhig na 'dra ba gzhan skyes pas gnas par 'khrul pa yin no zhes bshad pa ni 'dra ba gzhan dang gzhan
analyzed: de ltar yang gal te til mar la sogs pa zad pa'i mar me bzhin du ngo bo ma dmigs na de gnas par 'khrul par mi 'gyur ba zhig na 'dra ba gzhan skyes pas gnas par 'khrul pa yin no zhes bshad pa ni 'dra ba gzhan dang gzhan
translated: Thus, if the lamp is not perceived as the lamp oil is exhausted, there would be no error of its remaining. But because another similar one is produced, there is the error of its remaining.

original: skye bas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: skye bas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is what is said in the line, “because another similar one is produced.

original: gnas par 'khrul pa de yang de'i ngo bor sgro 'dogs pa las 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: gnas par 'khrul pa de yang de'i ngo bor sgro 'dogs pa las 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: ” And that error of its remaining is due to the superimposition of its identity.

original: de'i ngo bor sgro 'dogs pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i ngo bor sgro 'dogs pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For it is the nature of the superimposition of its identity.

original: mdun du gnas pa'i don dmigs par rnam par rtog pa na /
analyzed: mdun du gnas pa'i don dmigs par rnam par rtog pa na /
translated: When there is the conception of the object that is present in front,🔽even though it has ceased to exist because of momentariness, there is the superimposition of another similar one as being just that.

original: skad cig ma nyid kyis med par gyur kyang de'i ngo bo yang de nyid kyis gcig pa nyid du 'dra ba gzhan skyes pa la yang sgro 'dogs par byed do //🔽gnas @167a * //
analyzed: skad cig ma nyid kyis med par gyur kyang de'i ngo bo yang de nyid kyis gcig pa nyid du 'dra ba gzhan skyes pa la yang sgro 'dogs par byed do //🔽gnas @167a * //
translated: The error of its remaining is due to the superimposition of its identity.

original: par 'khrul pa yang de nyid yin te /
analyzed: par 'khrul pa yang de nyid yin te /
translated: That is also the error of the opponent.

original: tha snyad la ltos nas ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid do //
analyzed: tha snyad la ltos nas ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid do //
translated: The nature of cause and effect is based on convention.

original: de ltar byas na sgrub pa'i phyogs bsal te /
analyzed: de ltar byas na sgrub pa'i phyogs bsal te /
translated: Thus, the position of the proponent is refuted.

original: gzhan sel ba'i phyogs la tshad ma gzhan gyis brtag pa /
analyzed: gzhan sel ba'i phyogs la tshad ma gzhan gyis brtag pa /
translated: The investigation by another valid cognition of the position of the exclusion of another

original: ji ltar 'grub pa de bshad pa ni /
analyzed: ji ltar 'grub pa de bshad pa ni /
translated: is explained as follows:

original: 'di la gzhan gyi dngos po zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'di la gzhan gyi dngos po zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Here, it is called “the nature of another.”

original: 'di ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: 'di ni bshad zin to //
translated: This has already been explained.

original: gal te rnam par gcod par byed pa'i rtogs pa yang sgro 'dogs pa bsal bas nang gi don nyid rtogs par 'gyur pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te rnam par gcod par byed pa'i rtogs pa yang sgro 'dogs pa bsal bas nang gi don nyid rtogs par 'gyur pa ma yin nam /
translated: If the cognition that excludes also eliminates superimposition, is not the internal object itself realized?

original: des na sgro 'dogs zlog par byed pa yang sgrub pa'i ngo bo rtogs pa nyid las mi 'da' ste /
analyzed: des na sgro 'dogs zlog par byed pa yang sgrub pa'i ngo bo rtogs pa nyid las mi 'da' ste /
translated: Thus, the reversal of superimposition also does not go beyond the realization of the nature of the probandum,

original: nya phyis rtogs pa bzhin no //🔽'di nya phyis la brten nas dngul du rtogs pa skyes pa na /
analyzed: nya phyis rtogs pa bzhin no // 'di nya phyis la brten nas dngul du rtogs pa skyes pa na /
translated: like the realization of mother-of-pearl.🔽When the cognition of silver arises based on mother-of-pearl,🔽when the cognition of mother-of-pearl arises due to the proximity of the object, and so on,

original: gang gi tshe yul nye bar phyin pa la sogs pas nya phyis kyi rtogs pa skyes pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe yul nye bar phyin pa la sogs pas nya phyis kyi rtogs pa skyes pa de'i tshe /
translated: at that time,

original: 'di dngul gyi rtogs pa zlog par byed pa yin yang sgrub pa'i yul can nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di dngul gyi rtogs pa zlog par byed pa yin yang sgrub pa'i yul can nyid yin gyi /
translated: Although this is a reversal of the realization of silver, it is a subject that is established.🔽

original: rnam par gcod pa'i yul can ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par gcod pa'i yul can ni ma yin no //
translated: This is a cognition that eliminates the misconception of silver, but it is a cognition that establishes, not a cognition that eliminates.

original: 'di dngul ma yin no zhes bya bar gyur na ni rnam par gcod pa'i yul can yin no zhe na /🔽de ma yin no zhes bshad pa ni /
analyzed: 'di dngul ma yin no zhes bya bar gyur na ni rnam par gcod pa'i yul can yin no zhe na / de ma yin no zhes bshad pa ni /
translated: If it were to be the cognition that silver is not, then it would be a cognition that eliminates.

original: rnam par gcod pa'i zhes smos so //
analyzed: rnam par gcod pa'i zhes smos so //
translated: The statement “It is not that” is explained by the words “elimination” and “non-elimination.”

original: phyin ci log dang bcas pa'i shes pa dag ni sgro 'dogs kyi dbang gis ma rtogs pa'i don sgro 'dogs bzlog nas rtogs par byed pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: phyin ci log dang bcas pa'i shes pa dag ni sgro 'dogs kyi dbang gis ma rtogs pa'i don sgro 'dogs bzlog nas rtogs par byed pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Cognitions that are associated with error do not eliminate superimpositions and cause the understanding of an object that was not previously understood.

original: des na gang gis rtogs pa 'di dag sgrub pa'i yul can nyid du 'gyur ba sgro 'dogs zlog par byed pa'i rtogs pa dag ni dngos po'i cha ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'jug pa ma yin no ;
analyzed: des na gang gis rtogs pa 'di dag sgrub pa'i yul can nyid du 'gyur ba sgro 'dogs zlog par byed pa'i rtogs pa dag ni dngos po'i cha ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'jug pa ma yin no ;
translated: Therefore, those cognitions that eliminate superimpositions and cause the understanding of these objects are not engaged in order to understand a part of an entity that was not previously understood.

original: / ji ltar ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: / ji ltar ma yin zhe na /
translated: How is it not?

original: de ni mthong zin pa'i phyir ro zhes smos so //
analyzed: de ni mthong zin pa'i phyir ro zhes smos so //
translated: Because it has already been seen.

original: sgro 'dogs bsal nas rtogs pas dmigs pa'i rang bzhin de ni sngar nyid rtogs zin te /
analyzed: sgro 'dogs bsal nas rtogs pas dmigs pa'i rang bzhin de ni sngar nyid rtogs zin te /
translated: Having eliminated superimposition, one realizes that the nature of the object of observation is already realized.

original: chos can grub pa nyid na sgra la sogs pa'i rnam pa gsal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos can grub pa nyid na sgra la sogs pa'i rnam pa gsal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: When the subject is established, the aspect of sound and so on is clear.

original: gal te 'di yang sgra'i chos dmigs pa nyid kyis 'jug na ni sngar gyi de gsal ba ji lta ba de lta bu kho nar 'di yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te 'di yang sgra'i chos dmigs pa nyid kyis 'jug na ni sngar gyi de gsal ba ji lta ba de lta bu kho nar 'di yang 'gyur ro //
translated: If this is also engaged by the observation of the property of sound, then it would be just like the clarity of the former.

original: rtogs pa snga mas rtogs pa las mi rtogs pa nyid rnam pa lhag pa ni med do //
analyzed: rtogs pa snga mas rtogs pa las mi rtogs pa nyid rnam pa lhag pa ni med do //
translated: There is no additional aspect that is realized from the former realization.

original: des na 'di yang mi rtag pa nyid rtogs na sgra la 'jug pa chos can rtogs @167b pa dang snang ba mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na 'di yang mi rtag pa nyid rtogs na sgra la 'jug pa chos can rtogs @167b pa dang snang ba mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, when one realizes impermanence, the subject that engages sound is the same as the object of observation that is realized and appears.

original: rtogs pa de yang sngar skyes zin pa'i phyir 'dis ci zhig bya /
analyzed: rtogs pa de yang sngar skyes zin pa'i phyir 'dis ci zhig bya /
translated: Since that realization has already arisen, what is the use of this?

original: ci ste yang sngar de'i rang gi ngo bor gyur pa'i don dmigs pa de lta na yang gang las 'di mi rtag pa nyid nges pas tshim par 'gyur ba /
analyzed: ci ste yang sngar de'i rang gi ngo bor gyur pa'i don dmigs pa de lta na yang gang las 'di mi rtag pa nyid nges pas tshim par 'gyur ba /
translated: But if one observes the object that is its own nature in the past, then how is one satisfied by ascertaining its impermanence?

original: da ltar mi rtag pa dmigs pa bkar te rtogs par byed pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: da ltar mi rtag pa dmigs pa bkar te rtogs par byed pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But now, by focusing on impermanence, one realizes it.🔽That is not so.

original: de ma yin no zhes bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de ma yin no zhes bshad pa ni /
translated: The response is:

original: cha shas med pa la zhes smos so //
analyzed: cha shas med pa la zhes smos so //
translated: “In the partless.”

original: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being said:

original: gal te mi rtag pa nyid sgra'i rnam pa las logs shig tu yod na ni dmigs kyis bkar te rtogs pa zhig na /🔽sgra'i mi rtag pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni sgra nyid yin pa'i phyir sgra'i mi rtag pa nyid rtogs pa na sgra'i rnam pa gsal ba kho nar 'os kyi sgra'i cha shas kyi rang bzhin mi rtag pa nyid rtogs pa na ma rtogs pa'i rang bzhin rtogs pa'i
analyzed: gal te mi rtag pa nyid sgra'i rnam pa las logs shig tu yod na ni dmigs kyis bkar te rtogs pa zhig na / sgra'i mi rtag pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni sgra nyid yin pa'i phyir sgra'i mi rtag pa nyid rtogs pa na sgra'i rnam pa gsal ba kho nar 'os kyi sgra'i cha shas kyi rang bzhin mi rtag pa nyid rtogs pa na ma rtogs pa'i rang bzhin rtogs pa'i
translated: If impermanence existed separately from the aspect of sound, then it would be realized by focusing on it.🔽But because the nature of the impermanence of sound is sound itself, when the impermanence of sound is realized, it is only suitable that the aspect of sound is clear.

original: don du yin par ni mi 'byor to //
analyzed: don du yin par ni mi 'byor to //
translated: But when the impermanence that is the nature of a part of sound is realized, it is not suitable that the nature of what is not realized is realized.

original: 'o na dgag pa smra ba la yang ji ltar rtogs she na /
analyzed: 'o na dgag pa smra ba la yang ji ltar rtogs she na /
translated: Well then, how is it realized in the case of a negation?

original: 'di ni mdun du brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni mdun du brtag par bya'o //
translated: This should be examined.

original: 'on kyang dngos po'i rang bzhin rtogs pa'i don du 'jug na 'dir dngos su ni rtogs zin pa'i chos can la gang yin ba de rtogs pa yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang dngos po'i rang bzhin rtogs pa'i don du 'jug na 'dir dngos su ni rtogs zin pa'i chos can la gang yin ba de rtogs pa yin te /
translated: But if one engages in order to understand the nature of things, then here it is the already understood subject that is understood.

original: des na 'di yang de kho na bzhin du 'gyur ba don med do //
analyzed: des na 'di yang de kho na bzhin du 'gyur ba don med do //
translated: Therefore, this is just the same as that, and it is pointless.

original: rtogs pa'i don med kyang 'jug pa ni nyams pa med de /
analyzed: rtogs pa'i don med kyang 'jug pa ni nyams pa med de /
translated: Even though the object of understanding is pointless, engagement is not impaired,

original: sbyor ba'i rtogs pa sel ba nyid kyis 'jug pa'i phyir dngos po'i yul can yang srid par bshad zin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sbyor ba'i rtogs pa sel ba nyid kyis 'jug pa'i phyir dngos po'i yul can yang srid par bshad zin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because engagement is due to the elimination of the understanding of syllogisms, and it has already been explained that it is possible to have a thing as an object.

original: rtogs pa dang rnam par gcod pa gnyis don rtogs pa'i byed pa khyad med pa'i phyir ro //🔽mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i rtogs pa rnams dngos po tsam rtogs pa ma yin yang sgro 'dogs rnam par gcod par byed pa nyid kyis gzhan sel ba'i yul can nyid du 'gyur ba gang yin pa sgro 'dogs rnam par gcod pa tsam gyis rnam par gcod pa'i
analyzed: rtogs pa dang rnam par gcod pa gnyis don rtogs pa'i byed pa khyad med pa'i phyir ro // mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i rtogs pa rnams dngos po tsam rtogs pa ma yin yang sgro 'dogs rnam par gcod par byed pa nyid kyis gzhan sel ba'i yul can nyid du 'gyur ba gang yin pa sgro 'dogs rnam par gcod pa tsam gyis rnam par gcod pa'i
translated: Because there is no difference in the function of understanding and exclusion in the understanding of an object.🔽Even though the understanding of impermanence and so on is not the understanding of mere things, they are the object of exclusion through the elimination of superimposition.

original: yul can nyid du su smra /
analyzed: yul can nyid du su smra /
translated: Who would claim that the object of exclusion is the object of understanding through the mere elimination of superimposition?

original: rtag pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni rnam par gcod pa rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: rtag pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni rnam par gcod pa rtogs pa yin no //
translated: “It is not permanent” is the understanding of exclusion.

original: shes pa rnam pa gsum phan tshun mi 'dra bar rtogs pa yin te 'di sngon po'o snyam pa ni ngo bo tsam rtogs par rtogs so //
analyzed: shes pa rnam pa gsum phan tshun mi 'dra bar rtogs pa yin te 'di sngon po'o snyam pa ni ngo bo tsam rtogs par rtogs so //
translated: The understanding of the three types of consciousness is the understanding of the difference between them. “This is blue” is the understanding of the mere nature of the object.

original: sngon po med do snyam pa ni de med par rtogs pa dgag pa rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: sngon po med do snyam pa ni de med par rtogs pa dgag pa rtogs pa yin no //
translated: “Blue does not exist” is the understanding of the negation of the nonexistence of that.

original: @168a * // 'di sngon po ma yin pa ma yin no snyam pa ni dngos po la brten nas dngos po gzhan med par rtogs pa ni de la de'i ngo bo rnam par gcod pa'i phyir rnam par gcod pa'i rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: @168a * // 'di sngon po ma yin pa ma yin no snyam pa ni dngos po la brten nas dngos po gzhan med par rtogs pa ni de la de'i ngo bo rnam par gcod pa'i phyir rnam par gcod pa'i rtogs pa yin no //
translated: “This is not non-blue” is the understanding of the exclusion of another entity based on an entity, because it excludes the nature of that in that.

original: des na gal te dngos po rtogs par bya ba la rtogs pa'i byed pa rnam pa gnyis yin pa de lta na yang rnam par gcad par bya ba'i yul can dgag pas rnam par bcad pa nyid rnam par gcod pa'i yul la rnam par gcod pa yin par
analyzed: des na gal te dngos po rtogs par bya ba la rtogs pa'i byed pa rnam pa gnyis yin pa de lta na yang rnam par gcad par bya ba'i yul can dgag pas rnam par bcad pa nyid rnam par gcod pa'i yul la rnam par gcod pa yin par
translated: Therefore, even if the function of understanding is twofold in the understanding of an entity, the object of exclusion is the exclusion of the object of negation by negation.

original: brjod kyi sgro 'dogs sel ba tsam ni ma yin no //
analyzed: brjod kyi sgro 'dogs sel ba tsam ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not merely the elimination of superimpositions.

original: des na ji ltar 'di sngon po yin no //
analyzed: des na ji ltar 'di sngon po yin no //
translated: Therefore, how could it be that the cognition “This is blue”

original: sgra mi rtag pa yin no zhes bya ba la sogs par shes pa rigs mi mthun pa la brten pa'i dgag pa'i don gyi stong ba dag de'i yul can du 'gyur /
analyzed: sgra mi rtag pa yin no zhes bya ba la sogs par shes pa rigs mi mthun pa la brten pa'i dgag pa'i don gyi stong ba dag de'i yul can du 'gyur /
translated: and “Sound is impermanent” and so on are the subjects of the emptiness of the object of negation that is based on heterogeneous cognitions?

original: des na sgra dang shes pa sel ba'i yul can yin no zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig yin /
analyzed: des na sgra dang shes pa sel ba'i yul can yin no zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig yin /
translated: Therefore, what is this that is called “the subject that is the object of the exclusion of sound and cognition”?

original: de nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas pa rnams gzhan sel bas mdongs pa yin no zhes rab tu brjod do zhe na /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas pa rnams gzhan sel bas mdongs pa yin no zhes rab tu brjod do zhe na /
translated: For this very reason, it is said that the Buddhists are blinded by the exclusion of other.

original: de la 'dir lan btab ste /
analyzed: de la 'dir lan btab ste /
translated: Here, in response to that, we say the following.

original: 'di sngon po ma yin no snyam pa rnam par gcod pa rtogs pa yang sgro 'dogs rnam par gcod pa nyid kyi rnam par gcod pa'i yul la byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di sngon po ma yin no snyam pa rnam par gcod pa rtogs pa yang sgro 'dogs rnam par gcod pa nyid kyi rnam par gcod pa'i yul la byed pa yin gyi /
translated: The realization of the exclusion “This is not blue” is also the object of the exclusion that eliminates superimpositions.

original: rnam par gcad par bya ba med par rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par gcad par bya ba med par rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not the realization of the absence of the object of exclusion.

original: 'di ltar 'di sngon po ma yin no zhes bya ba'i dgag pa ni dgag par bya bar sngon po ma yin pa nyid dang 'brel pa yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'di sngon po ma yin no zhes bya ba'i dgag pa ni dgag par bya bar sngon po ma yin pa nyid dang 'brel pa yin la /
translated: Thus, the negation “This is not blue” is related to the negatee, “not blue.”

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni mdun na snang ba'i sngon po nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni mdun na snang ba'i sngon po nyid yin no //
translated: “ This” refers to the blue that appears in front.

original: des na 'dir rnam par gcod pa'i rtogs pa 'di zhes bya ba rtogs bzhin pa la gzhom par 'gyur ba gang yin pa la brten pa'i dgag pa zhugs pa na sngon po ma yin par rtogs pa'i sngon po la khyad par ci zhig rtogs par 'gyur /
analyzed: des na 'dir rnam par gcod pa'i rtogs pa 'di zhes bya ba rtogs bzhin pa la gzhom par 'gyur ba gang yin pa la brten pa'i dgag pa zhugs pa na sngon po ma yin par rtogs pa'i sngon po la khyad par ci zhig rtogs par 'gyur /
translated: Therefore, when the negation that is the basis for the realization “This is not blue” is engaged in the destruction of the realization “This,” what difference is there in the realization of blue?

original: 'di zhes bya bar rtogs bzhin pa nyid kyis ni rtogs pa 'di dag brten par 'gyur ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di zhes bya bar rtogs bzhin pa nyid kyis ni rtogs pa 'di dag brten par 'gyur ba ma yin gyi /
translated: The realization “This” is not based on the realization “This is not blue.”

original: 'on kyang sngon po ma yin pa bkag pa de la brten pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: 'on kyang sngon po ma yin pa bkag pa de la brten pa nyid kyis so //
translated: However, it is based on the negation of “not blue.”

original: de bkag pa de la brten pa zhes bya ba 'di yang ci zhig yin /
analyzed: de bkag pa de la brten pa zhes bya ba 'di yang ci zhig yin /
translated: What is this that is called “based on the negation of that”?

original: 'di ltar dgag pa ni dgag par bya ba sngon po ma yin pa kho na dang 'brel gyi /
analyzed: 'di ltar dgag pa ni dgag par bya ba sngon po ma yin pa kho na dang 'brel gyi /
translated: Thus, the negation is related only to the negatee, “not blue.”

original: 'di'o snyam par rtogs pa'i rten sngon po dang ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di'o snyam par rtogs pa'i rten sngon po dang ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not the basis for the thought “This is blue.”

original: de dang 'brel pa la rtogs pa'i chos nyid de la rtogs par 'gyur ba ni ma yin te /🔽ba lang khra bo zhes rtogs pa na khra bo @168b nyid lhas byin la bzhin no //
analyzed: de dang 'brel pa la rtogs pa'i chos nyid de la rtogs par 'gyur ba ni ma yin te / ba lang khra bo zhes rtogs pa na khra bo @168b nyid lhas byin la bzhin no //
translated: Nor is the mere fact of being cognized the distinguishing feature of the negation, because when one cognizes a multicolored cow, one does not cognize the mere fact of being cognized.

original: ji ltar ba lang khra bo dang ldan pas lhas byin la de ltar khyad par rtogs pa ma yin pa de bzhin du /🔽dgag pa'i khyad par sngon po ma yin pa'i chos nyid ni sngon po'i khyad par ma yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar ba lang khra bo dang ldan pas lhas byin la de ltar khyad par rtogs pa ma yin pa de bzhin du / dgag pa'i khyad par sngon po ma yin pa'i chos nyid ni sngon po'i khyad par ma yin te /
translated: Just as one does not cognize the distinguishing feature of Devadatta when one cognizes a multicolored cow,🔽in the same way, the mere fact of being cognized is not the distinguishing feature of the negation.

original: sngon po ma yin pa'i chos nyid dgag par bya ba yin pa'i phyir dang / bkag pa nyid kyis de'i chos su mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sngon po ma yin pa'i chos nyid dgag par bya ba yin pa'i phyir dang / bkag pa nyid kyis de'i chos su mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The mere fact of being cognized is not the distinguishing feature of the negation, because the mere fact of being cognized is not the object of negation, and because it is not tenable that the mere fact of being cognized is the distinguishing feature of the negation.🔽If you say that the distinguishing feature of the negation is the negation of the nonblue that is based on the blue,

original: de la brten pa'i sngon po ma yin pa bkag pa na de bkag pa'i chos sngon po'i khyad par yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de la brten pa'i sngon po ma yin pa bkag pa na de bkag pa'i chos sngon po'i khyad par yin no zhe na /
translated: then the negation of the nonblue is the distinguishing feature of the blue.

original: 'di sngon po ma yin no zhes rtogs pa'i phyir sngon po ma yin pa sngon po la brten pa zhes bya ba yin mod /
analyzed: 'di sngon po ma yin no zhes rtogs pa'i phyir sngon po ma yin pa sngon po la brten pa zhes bya ba yin mod /
translated: Because of the understanding “This is not blue,” it is called “not blue in dependence on blue.”

original: dgag pa'i don ni sngon po ma yin pa la brten pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dgag pa'i don ni sngon po ma yin pa la brten pa'i phyir /
translated: The meaning of negation is that it is in dependence on not blue.

original: 'di sngon po'i ci yin par 'gyur /
analyzed: 'di sngon po'i ci yin par 'gyur /
translated: How could this be blue?

original: khra bo'i yon tan ni lhas byin gyi ci yang ma yin no //
analyzed: khra bo'i yon tan ni lhas byin gyi ci yang ma yin no //
translated: The quality of being variegated is not anything at all in Lhejin.

original: kye dgag pa'i don gyi chos gzhan dang mi 'dra ba ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: kye dgag pa'i don gyi chos gzhan dang mi 'dra ba ni 'di yin te /
translated: Oh! The meaning of negation is not like other phenomena.

original: de rtogs kyang gang du yang chos dang chos can gyi dngos por mi rtogs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: de rtogs kyang gang du yang chos dang chos can gyi dngos por mi rtogs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: Even though it is understood, it is not understood as the entity of a phenomenon and a property-possessor.

original: 'di ltar gal te sngon po la sngon po ma yin pa med pa zhes bya ba'i chos 'ga' zhig rtogs na /
analyzed: 'di ltar gal te sngon po la sngon po ma yin pa med pa zhes bya ba'i chos 'ga' zhig rtogs na /
translated: Thus, if one understands a phenomenon called “the nonexistence of blue in blue,”

original: 'di la rtogs pa'i sngon po ma yin pa gang yin pa de dang 'di lhan cig par yang rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di la rtogs pa'i sngon po ma yin pa gang yin pa de dang 'di lhan cig par yang rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: then one would also understand that which is understood as not blue in this blue and it would be simultaneous with this blue.

original: de mi 'gog pa'i dngos po gzhan dang 'brel kyang des dben par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de mi 'gog pa'i dngos po gzhan dang 'brel kyang des dben par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: Even though it is related to another entity that is not a negation, it would not be a separation from that.

original: 'on te sngon po ma yin pa ldog pa tsam nyid dngos po med pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te sngon po ma yin pa ldog pa tsam nyid dngos po med pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But if the mere negation of non-blue is a non-thing,

original: de lta na yang dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni 'di nyid yin la /
analyzed: de lta na yang dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni 'di nyid yin la /
translated: then the nature of a non-thing is just this.

original: rtogs pa 'di tsam gyis mthar phyin pa yin te /
analyzed: rtogs pa 'di tsam gyis mthar phyin pa yin te /
translated: And this much realization is final,

original: sngon po ma yin pa ma yin no zhes bya ba gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: sngon po ma yin pa ma yin no zhes bya ba gang yin pa ste /
translated: for it is just “non-non-blue.”

original: gzhan gyi chos nyid du rtogs par 'gyur ba 'di'i rang bzhin gzhan ci zhig yod /🔽des na ji ltar dngos po 'jig pa na de med pa yin gyi /
analyzed: gzhan gyi chos nyid du rtogs par 'gyur ba 'di'i rang bzhin gzhan ci zhig yod / des na ji ltar dngos po 'jig pa na de med pa yin gyi /
translated: What other nature could there be of this realization of the reality of another?🔽Therefore, just as when a thing is destroyed, it is not that its nonexistence arises,

original: de med par 'byung ba ni ma yin pa'i phyir dngos po med pa de bzhin du dngos po med par rtogs pa la 'ang sngon po ma yin pa ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di tsam nyid dngos po med pa dang de rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: de med par 'byung ba ni ma yin pa'i phyir dngos po med pa de bzhin du dngos po med par rtogs pa la 'ang sngon po ma yin pa ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di tsam nyid dngos po med pa dang de rtogs pa yin no //
translated: but rather that its nonexistence is just that, so too, in the realization of nonexistence, “non-non-blue” is just a non-thing and the realization of it is the realization of a non-thing.

original: des na sngon po ma yin pa ma yin no zhes de med par rtogs pa na gang gis 'di khyad par du 'gyur ba med pa yod par rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: des na sngon po ma yin pa ma yin no zhes de med par rtogs pa na gang gis 'di khyad par du 'gyur ba med pa yod par rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, when one understands that it is not not-blue, one does not understand that it exists, since it is not distinguished from that.

original: sngon po ma yin pa ni yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir @169a * //
analyzed: sngon po ma yin pa ni yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir @169a * //
translated: Because that which is not blue does not exist,

original: dang sngon po ma yin ba med pa yang 'byung bar rtogs pa med pa'i phyir sngon po la cung zad kyang ma rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dang sngon po ma yin ba med pa yang 'byung bar rtogs pa med pa'i phyir sngon po la cung zad kyang ma rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: and because one does not understand the occurrence of the nonexistence of that which is not blue, one does not understand anything about blue at all.

original: ji ltar rtogs pa'i rang bzhin ngo bo med pa nyid khyad par yin pa'i phyir nyes pa med do zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar rtogs pa'i rang bzhin ngo bo med pa nyid khyad par yin pa'i phyir nyes pa med do zhe na /
translated: If you say that there is no fault, since the nature of the understanding is the absence of entityness, which is the distinction,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: de'i rang bzhin rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the nature of that is not understood.

original: sngon po ma yin ba med do zhes rtogs pa na de med do zhes rtogs kyi gzhan 'ga' zhig rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: sngon po ma yin ba med do zhes rtogs pa na de med do zhes rtogs kyi gzhan 'ga' zhig rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: When one understands that that which is not blue does not exist, one understands that it does not exist, but one does not understand anything else at all.

original: gal te sngon po ma yin ba las khyad par du rtogs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: gal te sngon po ma yin ba las khyad par du rtogs pa yin gyi /
translated: If you say that one understands it as distinguished from that which is not blue,

original: sngon po ma yin pa tsam ni ma yin bas na /
analyzed: sngon po ma yin pa tsam ni ma yin bas na /
translated: but not as merely not blue,

original: de nyid khyad par du 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: de nyid khyad par du 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: But it is a special case.

original: sngon po ma yin ba tsam rtogs pa ni ma yin la /
analyzed: sngon po ma yin ba tsam rtogs pa ni ma yin la /
translated: It is not the case that the mere non-blue is understood,

original: khyad par du rtogs pa yang ma yin gyi 'on kyang sngon po ma yin pa med pa yin pa'i phyir 'dir gang zhig khyad par nyid yin /
analyzed: khyad par du rtogs pa yang ma yin gyi 'on kyang sngon po ma yin pa med pa yin pa'i phyir 'dir gang zhig khyad par nyid yin /
translated: nor is it the case that a special case is understood. But since it is the non-existence of the non-blue, what is the special case here?

original: 'di sngon po dang 'brel pa ma yin no zhes ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: 'di sngon po dang 'brel pa ma yin no zhes ni bshad zin to //
translated: It is not related to the blue.

original: gal te sngon po ma yin pa la phyogs pa'i dgag pa'i don rtogs pa na /
analyzed: gal te sngon po ma yin pa la phyogs pa'i dgag pa'i don rtogs pa na /
translated: If the meaning of the negation that faces the non-blue is understood,

original: de la sngon po ma yin ba med par 'gyur bas sngon po ma yin pa nyid du rtogs pa'i sngon po des dben pa'i sngon por rtogs par 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: de la sngon po ma yin ba med par 'gyur bas sngon po ma yin pa nyid du rtogs pa'i sngon po des dben pa'i sngon por rtogs par 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: then since the non-blue would not exist, would the blue that is understood as the non-blue not be understood as the blue that is void of the non-blue?

original: dben pa dang log pa dang stong ba zhes bya ba 'di yang ci zhig dben pa dang log pa dang stong pa nyid kyi khyad par can yin no //
analyzed: dben pa dang log pa dang stong ba zhes bya ba 'di yang ci zhig dben pa dang log pa dang stong pa nyid kyi khyad par can yin no //
translated: What is this so-called void, reversed, and empty? It is a special case of void, reversed, and empty.

original: des na 'di dag kyang dngos po gzhan gyi rang bzhin nam ldog pa tsam yin yang rung ste /
analyzed: des na 'di dag kyang dngos po gzhan gyi rang bzhin nam ldog pa tsam yin yang rung ste /
translated: Therefore, even if these are the nature or mere isolate of another thing,

original: ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis don med pa kho nar rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis don med pa kho nar rtogs par bya'o //
translated: one should understand that, in the manner explained, they are only meaningless.

original: 'dis ni dben pa la sogs pa'i rtogs pa rnams rnam par gcod pa rtogs pa yin ba yang gsal bar rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni dben pa la sogs pa'i rtogs pa rnams rnam par gcod pa rtogs pa yin ba yang gsal bar rtogs par bya'o //
translated: By this, one should also understand clearly that the understanding of the negation of the understanding of “isolated” and so on is also understood.

original: sngon po ma yin pa la phyogs pa'i dgag pa'i don rtogs pas sngon po sngon po ma yin pas dben par rtogs par nus pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: sngon po ma yin pa la phyogs pa'i dgag pa'i don rtogs pas sngon po sngon po ma yin pas dben par rtogs par nus pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that the understanding of the meaning of the negation that faces nonblue is able to understand blue as isolated from nonblue.

original: 'on kyang sngon po tsam rtogs pa'i phyir dang / sngon po ma yin pa ma rtogs pa'i phyir sngon po ma yin pa la phyogs pa'i dgag pa'i don sngon po la ji ltar 'jug / des na ji skad brjod pa'i skyon mi spobs so //
analyzed: 'on kyang sngon po tsam rtogs pa'i phyir dang / sngon po ma yin pa ma rtogs pa'i phyir sngon po ma yin pa la phyogs pa'i dgag pa'i don sngon po la ji ltar 'jug / des na ji skad brjod pa'i skyon mi spobs so //
translated: However, because of the understanding of blue itself and because of the nonunderstanding of nonblue, how does the meaning of the negation that faces nonblue engage blue? Therefore, the fault stated earlier is not overcome.

original: de'i phyir 'di sngon po ma yin no zhes rtogs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di sngon po ma yin no zhes rtogs te /
translated: Therefore, one understands “This is not nonblue.”

original: sngon po dang 'brel pa'i sngon po ma yin pa la brten pa'i med pa rtogs pa na sngon po la brten nas rtogs par bya ba'i rnam @169b pa'i khyad par med kyang sngon po la brten pa'i sngon po ma yin par rtogs pa bzlog par 'gyur ba'i phyir
analyzed: sngon po dang 'brel pa'i sngon po ma yin pa la brten pa'i med pa rtogs pa na sngon po la brten nas rtogs par bya ba'i rnam @169b pa'i khyad par med kyang sngon po la brten pa'i sngon po ma yin par rtogs pa bzlog par 'gyur ba'i phyir
translated: When one realizes the nonexistence of non-blue that is based on blue, although there is no difference in the aspects that are to be realized in dependence on blue, one does realize the negation of non-blue that is based on blue.

original: de'i don gyis 'di der rnam par gcod pa rtogs par brjod do //
analyzed: de'i don gyis 'di der rnam par gcod pa rtogs par brjod do //
translated: Therefore, in terms of its object, it is said that this is the realization of the exclusion of that.

original: des na sngon po ma yin par rtogs pa nyid 'dir sgro 'dogs yin la de zlog par byed pas ni rtogs pa 'di rnam par gcod par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: des na sngon po ma yin par rtogs pa nyid 'dir sgro 'dogs yin la de zlog par byed pas ni rtogs pa 'di rnam par gcod par byed pa yin no //
translated: Thus the realization of non-blue is superimposition here, and the negation of that is the realization of the exclusion of that.🔽Therefore, just as the thought “This is not silver” negates the superimposition that nacre is silver, in the same way, the realization of nacre also excludes that.🔽Therefore, just as the thought “This is not silver” negates the superimposition that nacre is silver, in the same way, the realization of nacre also excludes that.

original: des na ji ltar 'di dngul ma yin no snyam pas nya phyis la dngul du sgro 'dogs pa bzlog pa de bzhin du nya phyis su rtogs pas kyang yin pas de yang rnam par gcod pa'i yul can nyid do //🔽de bzhin du 'di sngon po yin no snyam pa la sogs pa yang rtogs par byed do //
analyzed: des na ji ltar 'di dngul ma yin no snyam pas nya phyis la dngul du sgro 'dogs pa bzlog pa de bzhin du nya phyis su rtogs pas kyang yin pas de yang rnam par gcod pa'i yul can nyid do //🔽de bzhin du 'di sngon po yin no snyam pa la sogs pa yang rtogs par byed do //
translated: Therefore, just as the thought “This is not silver” negates the superimposition that nacre is silver, in the same way, the realization of nacre also excludes that.🔽Therefore, just as the thought “This is not silver” negates the superimposition that nacre is silver, in the same way, the realization of nacre also excludes that.🔽Therefore, just as the thought “This is not silver” negates the superimposition that nacre is silver, in the same way, the realization of nacre also excludes that.🔽Therefore, just as the thought “This is not silver” negates the superimposition that nacre is silver, in the same way, the realization of nacre also excludes that.🔽Therefore, just as the thought “This is not silver” negates the superimposition that nacre is silver, in the same way, the realization of nacre also excludes that.🔽Therefore, just as the thought “This is not silver” negates the superimposition that nacre is silver, in the same way, the realization of nacre also excludes that.🔽Therefore, just as the thought “This is not silver” negates the superimposition that nacre is silver, in the same way, the realization of nacre also excludes that.🔽Therefore, just as the thought “This is not silver” negates the superimposition that nacre is silver, in the same way, the realization of nacre also excludes that.🔽Therefore, just as the thought “This is not silver” negates the superimposition that nacre

original: de nyid kyi phyir slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos sgras ni sgra dang don gzhan sel bas rang gi don sgrub par byed pa zhes gsungs pas sgro 'dogs pa'i sgo nas sgra dang don gzhan du thal la /🔽de bzlog pa nyid kyis ni sgra rang gi don la gzhan sel bar brjod pas slob dpon rnam 'grel mdzad pas dgongs pa brjod do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos sgras ni sgra dang don gzhan sel bas rang gi don sgrub par byed pa zhes gsungs pas sgro 'dogs pa'i sgo nas sgra dang don gzhan du thal la / de bzlog pa nyid kyis ni sgra rang gi don la gzhan sel bar brjod pas slob dpon rnam 'grel mdzad pas dgongs pa brjod do //
translated: Therefore, the master Dignaga said that a word establishes its own meaning by excluding other words and other meanings.🔽And the master Dharmakirti, in his Commentary on Valid Cognition, expressed his intention by saying that a word excludes other things from its own meaning.

original: des na de ltar 'chad pa po gzhan dag gi shes rab kyi rten du ma gyur cing /
analyzed: des na de ltar 'chad pa po gzhan dag gi shes rab kyi rten du ma gyur cing /
translated: Therefore, those who explain the meaning of the Commentary in this way are not worthy of the name of scholars.

original: rnam pa gnyis kyis bshad du zin kyang ma rtogs pa bdag cag gis 'bad du bkral kyang shes med dad pa dang mi ldan ba dag gis ji ltar rtogs par 'gyur /🔽tshul 'di la ma brten par ni gzhung 'di 'am dngos po la bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi gzhan sel ba la /
analyzed: rnam pa gnyis kyis bshad du zin kyang ma rtogs pa bdag cag gis 'bad du bkral kyang shes med dad pa dang mi ldan ba dag gis ji ltar rtogs par 'gyur / tshul 'di la ma brten par ni gzhung 'di 'am dngos po la bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi gzhan sel ba la /
translated: Even if the Commentary is explained in these two ways, those who do not understand it will not understand it even if we try to explain it.

original: mdongs pa yun ring po nas 'khras pa phyir bcos par mi nus so //
analyzed: mdongs pa yun ring po nas 'khras pa phyir bcos par mi nus so //
translated: Without relying on this method, it is impossible to correct the long-standing blindness of those who do not understand the doctrine of the exclusion of other in the scriptures of the Sugata.

original: kha cig med par dgag pa'i yul can du smra ba ni byis pa rang gi lag pas me mdag 'dren pa bzhin du yongs su nyon mongs pas gdung bar 'gyur ro zhes gzhan du rgyas par bstan zin to //
